We_PRP may_MD ask_VB questions_NNS as_IN you_PRP go_VBP along_IN ,_, or_CC we_PRP may_MD wait_VB until_IN the_DT end_NN ._. ''_''
No_DT lawyers_NNS or_CC tape_NN recorders_NNS were_VBD present_JJ ._.
The_DT only_RB extra_JJ people_NNS were_VBD a_DT couple_NN of_IN personnel_NNS specialists_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP knew_VBD Mr._NNP Stone_NNP 's_POS case_NN intimately_RB and_CC would_MD help_VB fill_VB in_IN any_DT facts_NNS needed_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT court_NN the_DT full_JJ picture_NN ._.
Over_IN a_DT cup_NN of_IN coffee_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Stone_NNP told_VBD his_PRP$ story_NN ._.
He_PRP talked_VBD about_IN 20_CD minutes_NNS ._.
When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD through_IN ,_, the_DT court_NN members_NNS asked_VBD many_JJ questions_NNS ,_, then_RB the_DT chairman_NN said_VBD they_PRP would_MD like_VB to_TO hear_VB his_PRP$ manager_NN 's_POS side_NN and_CC talk_VB to_TO witnesses_NNS ._.
The_DT chairman_NN promised_VBD Mr._NNP Stone_NNP a_DT decision_NN within_IN two_CD weeks_NNS ._.
Bob_NNP Stone_NNP is_VBZ a_DT fictional_JJ name_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT incident_NN described_VBN is_VBZ real_JJ ._.
It_PRP happened_VBD at_IN Northrop_NNP Corp._NNP in_IN Los_NNP Angeles_NNP ._.
The_DT court_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Management_NNP Appeals_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, or_CC just_RB ``_`` MAC_NNP ,_, ''_'' and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO hear_VB a_DT couple_NN of_IN dozen_NN cases_VBZ a_DT year_NN ._.
Alter_VB some_DT details_NNS of_IN this_DT example_NN and_CC it_PRP could_MD be_VB taking_VBG place_NN today_NN at_IN Federal_NNP Express_NNP in_IN Memphis_NNP ,_, the_DT Defense_NNP and_CC Underseas_NNP Systems_NNP divisions_NNS of_IN Honeywell_NNP in_IN Minneapolis_NNP ,_, a_DT General_NNP Electric_NNP plant_NN in_IN Columbia_NNP ,_, Md._NNP ,_, or_CC a_DT number_NN of_IN other_JJ companies_NNS ._.
These_DT firms_NNS are_VBP pioneers_NNS in_IN a_DT significant_JJ new_JJ trend_NN in_IN the_DT corporate_JJ world_NN :_: the_DT rise_NN of_IN what_WP I_PRP call_VBP corporate_JJ due_JJ process_NN ._.
Although_IN corporate_JJ due_JJ process_NN is_VBZ practiced_VBN today_NN in_IN few_JJ companies_NNS --_: perhaps_RB 40_CD to_TO 60_CD --_: it_PRP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT fastest_JJS developing_VBG trends_NNS in_IN industry_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT coming_VBG decade_NN a_DT majority_NN of_IN people-oriented_JJ companies_NNS are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO adopt_VB it_PRP ._.
Corporate_JJ due_JJ process_NN appeals_NNS to_TO management_NN for_IN a_DT variety_NN of_IN reasons_NNS ._.
It_PRP reduces_VBZ lawsuits_NNS from_IN disgruntled_JJ employees_NNS and_CC ex-employees_NNS ,_, with_IN all_DT that_WDT means_VBZ for_IN reduced_VBN legal_JJ costs_NNS and_CC better_RBR public_JJ relations_NNS ._.
It_PRP helps_VBZ to_TO keep_VB out_IN unions_NNS ._.
It_PRP increases_VBZ employee_NN commitment_NN to_TO the_DT company_NN ,_, with_IN all_DT that_WDT means_VBZ for_IN efficiency_NN and_CC quality_NN control_NN ._.
What_WP must_MD your_PRP$ management_NN team_NN do_VBP to_TO establish_VB corporate_JJ due_JJ process_NN ?_.
Here_RB are_VBP four_CD key_JJ steps_NNS :_:
1_CD ._. Make_VB sure_JJ you_PRP have_VBP a_DT strong_JJ personnel_NNS department_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO handle_VB most_RBS of_IN the_DT complaints_NNS that_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB solved_VBN in_IN the_DT trenches_NNS by_IN managers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, else_RB the_DT company_NN court_NN or_CC adjudicators_NNS will_MD be_VB inundated_VBN with_IN cases_NNS ._.
At_IN Polaroid_NNP ,_, the_DT Personnel_NNP Policy_NNP Planning_NNP Committee_NNP may_MD hear_VB only_RB about_IN 20_CD cases_VBZ a_DT year_NN ;_: the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT many_JJ hundreds_NNS of_IN complaints_NNS are_VBP resolved_VBN at_IN earlier_JJR stages_NNS ._.
At_IN TWA_NNP ,_, the_DT System_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Adjustment_NNP hears_VBZ 50_CD to_TO 75_CD cases_VBZ a_DT year_NN ,_, only_RB a_DT fraction_NN of_IN the_DT complaints_NNS brought_VBN to_TO personnel_NNS specialists_NNS ._.
At_IN Citicorp_NNP ,_, the_DT Problem_NNP Review_NNP Board_NNP may_MD hear_VB only_RB 12_CD or_CC so_RB cases_VBZ because_IN of_IN personnel_NNS 's_POS skill_NN in_IN complaint-resolution_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT typical_JJ year_NN ,_, up_IN to_TO 20_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN force_NN goes_VBZ to_TO personnel_NNS specialists_NNS with_IN complaints_NNS of_IN unfair_JJ treatment_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT large_JJ company_NN that_WDT means_VBZ many_JJ hundreds_NNS of_IN complaints_NNS for_IN personnel_NNS to_TO handle_VB ._.
2_CD ._. Formally_RB or_CC informally_RB ,_, train_NN all_DT your_PRP$ managers_NNS and_CC supervisors_NNS in_IN the_DT company_NN 's_POS due-process_NN approach_NN ._.
See_VB that_IN they_PRP know_VBP company_NN personnel_NNS policy_NN backwards_RB and_CC forwards_RB ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT ``_`` law_NN ''_'' governing_VBG company_NN courts_NNS and_CC adjudicators_NNS ._.
Coach_NNP them_PRP in_IN handling_NN complaints_NNS so_RB that_IN they_PRP can_MD resolve_VB problems_NNS immediately_RB ._.
In_IN case_NN managers_NNS and_CC personnel_NNS specialists_NNS are_VBP unsuccessful_JJ and_CC subordinates_NNS take_VBP their_PRP$ complaints_NNS to_TO a_DT company_NN court_NN or_CC adjudicator_NN ,_, teach_VB managers_NNS to_TO accept_VB reversals_NNS as_IN a_DT fact_NN of_IN business_NN life_NN ,_, for_IN in_IN a_DT good_JJ due-process_NN system_NN they_PRP are_VBP bound_VBN to_TO happen_VB ._.
In_IN the_DT 15_CD companies_NNS I_PRP studied_VBD ,_, reversal_NN rates_NNS range_VBP on_IN the_DT average_NN from_IN 20_CD %_NN to_TO 40_CD %_NN ._.
3_CD ._. Decide_VB whether_IN you_PRP want_VBP a_DT panel_NN system_NN or_CC a_DT single_JJ adjudicator_NN ._.
A_DT panel_NN system_NN like_IN that_DT in_NN the_DT Bob_NNP Stone_NNP example_NN enjoys_VBZ such_JJ advantages_NNS as_IN high_JJ credibility_NN and_CC ,_, for_IN the_DT panelists_NNS ,_, mutual_JJ support_NN ._.
An_DT adjudicator_NN system_NN --_: that_DT is_VBZ ,_, an_DT investigator_NN who_WP acts_VBZ first_JJ as_IN a_DT fact-finder_NN and_CC then_RB switches_VBZ hats_NNS and_CC arbitrates_VBZ the_DT facts_NNS --_: has_VBZ such_JJ advantages_NNS as_IN speed_NN ,_, flexibility_NN and_CC maximum_JJ privacy_NN ._.
International_NNP Business_NNP Machines_NNPS and_CC Bank_NNP of_IN America_NNP are_VBP among_IN the_DT companies_NNS using_VBG the_DT single-adjudicator_JJ approach_NN ._.
4_CD ._. Make_VB your_PRP$ due-process_NN system_NN visible_JJ ._.
It_PRP wo_MD n't_RB do_VB any_DT good_NN for_IN anybody_NN unless_IN employees_NNS know_VBP about_IN it_PRP ._.

''_'' But_CC the_DT enterprises_NNS still_RB in_IN state_NN hands_NNS include_VBP the_DT biggest_JJS and_CC most_RBS economically_RB powerful_JJ ones_NNS in_IN Mexico_NNP ;_: indeed_RB ,_, they_PRP virtually_RB constitute_VBP the_DT economic_JJ infrastructure_NN ._.

The_DT bottom_NN line_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ not_RB economic_JJ but_CC political_JJ reform_NN ._.
A_DT long_JJ succession_NN of_IN Mexican_JJ presidents_NNS arbitrarily_RB nationalized_VBD whatever_WDT industry_NN they_PRP took_VBD a_DT fancy_JJ to_TO ,_, without_IN having_VBG to_TO answer_VB to_TO the_DT public_NN ._.

Daniel_NNP James_NNP President_NNP Mexico-United_NNP States_NNP Institute_NNP
The_DT board_NN of_IN this_DT Ponce_NNP ,_, Puerto_NNP Rico_NNP concern_NN voted_VBD to_TO suspend_VB payment_NN of_IN its_PRP$ quarterly_NN of_IN 11_CD cents_NNS a_DT share_NN for_IN the_DT third_JJ quarter_NN ._.

Most_JJS of_IN the_DT two_CD dozen_NN scientists_NNS taking_VBG the_DT podium_NN reported_VBD results_NNS with_IN new_JJ ,_, more_RBR sophisticated_JJ variations_NNS of_IN the_DT seemingly_RB simple_JJ electrolysis-of-water_JJ experiments_NNS described_VBD last_JJ March_NNP by_IN Messrs._NNP Fleischmann_NNP and_CC Pons_NNP ._.
The_DT experiments_NNS involve_VBP encircling_VBG a_DT thin_JJ rod_NN of_IN palladium_NN metal_NN with_IN a_DT wire_NN of_IN platinum_NN and_CC plunging_VBG the_DT two_CD electrodes_NNS into_IN ``_`` heavy_JJ ''_'' water_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT hydrogen_NN atoms_NNS are_VBP a_DT doubly_RB heavy_JJ form_NN known_VBN as_IN deuterium_NN ._.
When_WRB an_DT electric_JJ current_NN is_VBZ applied_VBN to_TO the_DT palladium_NN and_CC platinum_NN electrodes_NNS ,_, the_DT heavy_JJ water_NN did_VBD begin_VB to_TO break_VB up_IN ,_, or_CC dissociate_VB ._.
Ordinarily_RB the_DT electrolysis_NN ,_, or_CC breakup_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT water_NN would_MD consume_VB almost_RB all_DT of_IN the_DT electrical_JJ energy_NN ._.
But_CC Messrs._NNP Fleischmann_NNP and_CC Pons_NNP said_VBD their_PRP$ experiments_NNS also_RB produced_VBN large_JJ amounts_NNS of_IN heat_NN ._.
The_DT heat_NN energy_NN plus_CC the_DT energy_NN consumed_VBN by_IN the_DT breakup_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN molecules_NNS added_VBD to_TO far_RB more_JJR energy_NN coming_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT apparatus_NN than_IN electrical_JJ energy_NN going_VBG in_IN ,_, they_PRP reported_VBD ._.
Because_IN they_PRP also_RB detected_VBD tritium_NN and_CC indications_NNS of_IN nuclear_JJ radiation_NN ,_, they_PRP asserted_VBD that_IN the_DT ``_`` excess_JJ ''_'' heat_NN energy_NN must_MD be_VB coming_VBG from_IN energy_NN released_VBN by_IN the_DT nuclear_JJ fusion_NN of_IN deuterium_NN atoms_NNS inside_IN the_DT palladium_NN rod_NN ._.
As_IN of_IN last_JJ weekend_NN ,_, a_DT dozen_NN labs_NNS also_RB have_VBP reported_VBN measuring_VBG ``_`` excess_JJ ''_'' heat_NN from_IN similar_JJ electrolytic_JJ experiments_NNS ,_, although_IN amounts_NNS of_IN such_JJ heat_NN vary_VBP widely_RB ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT seven_CD reports_NNS presented_VBN here_RB of_IN excess_JJ heat_NN production_NN was_VBD given_VBN by_IN Richard_NNP A._NNP Oriani_NNP ,_, professor_NN of_IN chemical_NN engineering_NN at_IN the_DT University_NNP of_IN Minnesota_NNP ._.

On_IN the_DT fourth_JJ ``_`` run_VB ''_'' with_IN the_DT borrowed_VBN rod_NN ,_, the_DT experiment_NN began_VBD producing_VBG excess_JJ heat_NN ._.
The_DT experiment_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN briefly_NN to_TO change_VB an_DT instrument_NN ._.
When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD restarted_VBN ,_, heat_NN output_NN ``_`` really_RB took_VBD off_IN ''_'' and_CC produced_VBN excess_JJ heat_NN for_IN several_JJ hours_NNS before_IN dying_VBG down_RB ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ._.

It_PRP would_MD go_VB along_IN doing_VBG nothing_NN but_CC dissociating_VBG the_DT heavy_JJ water_NN and_CC then_RB at_IN totally_RB unpredictable_JJ times_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD begin_VB producing_VBG excess_JJ heat_NN for_IN as_RB long_RB as_IN 10_CD or_CC 11_CD hours_NNS before_IN quieting_VBG down_RB ._.
The_DT excess_JJ heat_NN was_VBD 15_CD %_NN to_TO 20_CD %_NN more_JJR than_IN the_DT energy_NN involved_VBN in_IN the_DT electrolysis_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Oriani_NNP said_VBD the_DT heat_NN bursts_NNS were_VBD too_RB large_JJ and_CC too_RB long_JJ to_TO be_VB explained_VBN by_IN the_DT sudden_JJ release_NN of_IN energy_NN that_WDT might_MD have_VB slowly_RB accumulated_VBN during_IN the_DT experiments_NNS '_POS quiescent_JJ times_NNS ,_, as_IN some_DT scientists_NNS have_VBP suggested_VBN ._.

The_DT bursts_NNS often_RB occur_VBP ,_, they_PRP said_VBD ,_, after_IN they_PRP ``_`` perturbed_JJ ''_'' the_DT experiments_NNS by_IN raising_VBG or_CC lowering_VBG the_DT amount_NN of_IN electric_JJ current_JJ being_NN applied_VBN ,_, or_CC switching_VBG the_DT current_NN off_IN and_CC on_RB ._.
One_CD chemist_NN privately_RB suggested_VBD this_DT hinted_VBD that_IN some_DT ``_`` anomalous_JJ ''_'' chemical_NN reactions_NNS might_MD be_VB producing_VBG the_DT heat_NN ._.
One_CD reason_NN questions_NNS surround_VBP the_DT heat_NN experiments_NNS is_VBZ that_IN they_PRP involve_VBP unusually_RB meticulous_JJ measurements_NNS ._.
Typically_RB ,_, the_DT input_NN energy_NN ranges_NNS from_IN a_DT third_JJ of_IN a_DT watt_NN to_TO one_CD watt_NN and_CC the_DT excess_JJ energy_NN is_VBZ measured_VBN in_IN tenths_NNS of_IN a_DT watt_NN ._.
One_CD exception_NN is_VBZ a_DT continuing_VBG experiment_NN at_IN Stanford_NNP University_NNP where_WRB as_RB much_JJ as_IN 10_CD watts_NNS of_IN energy_NN are_VBP being_VBG put_VB into_IN the_DT electrolytic_JJ cells_NNS ._.
A_DT cell_NN filled_VBN with_IN heavy_JJ water_NN is_VBZ producing_VBG 1.0_CD to_TO 1.5_CD watts_NNS more_JJR heat_NN than_IN an_DT identical_JJ electrolytic_JJ cell_NN filled_VBN with_IN ordinary_JJ water_NN next_JJ to_TO it_PRP ,_, reported_VBD Turgut_NNP M._NNP Gur_NNP ,_, an_DT associate_NN of_IN materials_NNS scientist_NN Robert_NNP A._NNP Huggins_NNP ,_, head_NN of_IN the_DT Stanford_NNP experimental_JJ team_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT few_JJ hints_NNS the_DT excess_JJ heat_NN might_MD be_VB produced_VBN by_IN fusion_NN came_VBD from_IN brief_JJ remarks_NNS by_IN chemist_NN John_NNP Bockris_NNP of_IN Texas_NNP A&M_NNP University_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Bockris_NNP previously_RB reported_VBD getting_VBG bursts_NNS of_IN excess_JJ heat_NN and_CC of_IN detecting_VBG increasing_VBG amounts_NNS of_IN tritium_NN forming_VBG in_IN the_DT heavy_JJ water_NN ._.
He_PRP said_VBD that_IN within_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ days_NNS ,_, he_PRP 's_VBZ gotten_VBN evidence_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT ``_`` weak_JJ correlation_NN ''_'' between_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT heat_NN bursts_NNS occur_VBP and_CC the_DT production_NN of_IN tritium_NN ._.

``_`` I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB the_DT checks_NNS are_VBP worth_JJ $_$ 15_CD apiece_RB ,_, ''_'' he_PRP says_VBZ ._.
Why_WRB Mr._NNP Jackson_NNP ,_, who_WP could_MD n't_RB be_VB reached_VBN for_IN comment_NN ,_, has_VBZ made_VBN some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ checks_NNS available_JJ for_IN sale_NN is_VBZ n't_RB clear_JJ ._.
He_PRP probably_RB has_VBZ n't_RB done_VBN it_PRP for_IN the_DT cash_NN ._.
``_`` I_PRP would_MD say_VB he_PRP 's_VBZ definitely_RB not_RB in_IN need_NN of_IN money_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Matt_NNP Merola_NNP ,_, an_DT agent_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Jackson_NNP 's_POS based_VBN in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
``_`` He_PRP has_VBZ good_JJ investments_NNS ._. ''_''
And_CC Mr._NNP Jackson_NNP probably_RB has_VBZ opened_VBN new_JJ checking_NN accounts_NNS ,_, too_RB ._.
Or_CC at_IN least_JJS he_PRP should_MD ._.
``_`` I_PRP assume_VBP those_DT accounts_NNS are_VBP closed_VBN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Smalling_NNP ,_, referring_VBG to_TO the_DT accounts_NNS of_IN the_DT canceled_VBN checks_NNS ._.
``_`` I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB he_PRP 'd_MD want_VB to_TO give_VB out_IN his_PRP$ current_JJ account_NN numbers_NNS ._.
USX_NNP Corp._NNP and_CC its_PRP$ Japanese_JJ partner_NN ,_, Kobe_NNP Steel_NNP Ltd._NNP ,_, agreed_VBD to_TO form_VB a_DT joint_JJ venture_NN to_TO build_VB a_DT new_JJ plant_NN to_TO produce_VB hot-dipped_JJ galvanized_JJ sheet_NN products_NNS ,_, mainly_RB for_IN the_DT automotive_JJ market_NN ._.
Terms_NNS were_VBD n't_RB disclosed_VBN for_IN the_DT plant_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD have_VB annual_JJ capacity_NN of_IN 600,000_CD tons_NNS ._.
The_DT move_NN by_IN the_DT nation_NN 's_POS largest_JJS steelmaker_NN follows_VBZ a_DT string_NN of_IN earlier_JJR announcements_NNS by_IN other_JJ major_JJ steel_NN companies_NNS ._.
Bethlehem_NNP Steel_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, LTV_NNP Corp._NNP and_CC Armco_NNP Inc._NNP all_DT have_NN plans_NNS to_TO build_VB additional_JJ lines_NNS for_IN such_JJ coated_VBN corrosion-resistant_JJ steel_NN ._.
The_DT surge_NN in_IN production_NN ,_, analysts_NNS say_VBP ,_, raises_VBZ questions_NNS about_IN capacity_NN outpacing_VBG demand_NN ._.
They_PRP note_VBP that_IN most_RBS of_IN the_DT new_JJ plants_NNS will_MD come_VB on_IN line_NN in_IN 1992_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT current_JJ import_NN trade_NN restraint_NN program_NN ends_NNS ,_, which_WDT could_MD result_VB in_IN more_JJR imports_NNS ._.
``_`` There_EX 's_VBZ too_RB much_JJ capacity_NN ,_, ''_'' contended_VBD Charles_NNP Bradford_NNP ,_, an_DT analyst_NN with_IN Merrill_NNP Lynch_NNP Capital_NNP Markets_NNPS ._.
``_`` I_PRP do_VBP n't_RB think_VB there_EX 's_VBZ anyone_NN not_RB building_VBG one_CD ._. ''_''
He_PRP does_VBZ add_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN transplanted_VBN Japanese_JJ car_NN makers_NNS are_VBP boosting_VBG the_DT levels_NNS of_IN U.S.-made_JJ steel_NN in_IN their_PRP$ autos_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN relying_VBG heavily_RB on_IN imported_VBN steel_NN ._.
That_DT trend_NN could_MD increase_VB demand_NN for_IN hot-dipped_JJ galvanized_JJ sheet_NN ._.
The_DT hot-dipped_JJ galvanized_JJ segment_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT fastest-growing_JJ and_CC most_RBS profitable_JJ segments_NNS of_IN the_DT steel_NN market_NN ,_, coveted_VBN by_IN all_DT major_JJ integrated_VBN steelmakers_NNS wanting_VBG to_TO maintain_VB an_DT edge_NN over_IN smaller_JJR minimills_NNS and_CC reconstructed_JJ mills_NNS --_: those_DT spun_VBN off_IN to_TO employees_NNS ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, USX_NNP said_VBD it_PRP expects_VBZ the_DT market_NN for_IN coated_VBN sheet_NN steel_NN to_TO reach_VB 12_CD million_CD tons_NNS annually_RB by_IN 1992_CD ,_, compared_VBN with_IN 10.2_CD million_CD tons_NNS shipped_VBN in_IN 1988_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT first_JJ eight_CD months_NNS of_IN 1989_CD ,_, analysts_NNS say_VBP shipments_NNS of_IN hot-dipped_JJ galvanized_JJ steel_NN increased_VBN about_IN 8_CD %_NN from_IN a_DT year_NN earlier_RBR ,_, while_IN overall_JJ steel_NN shipments_NNS were_VBD up_IN only_RB 2.4_CD %_NN ._.
USX_NNP and_CC Kobe_NNP Steel_NNP hope_NN to_TO reach_VB a_DT definitive_JJ agreement_NN establishing_VBG the_DT 50-50_JJ partnership_NN by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, with_IN construction_NN tentatively_RB slated_VBD for_IN the_DT spring_NN of_IN 1990_CD and_CC production_NN by_IN 1992_CD ._.
USX_NNP already_RB has_VBZ six_CD lines_NNS in_IN existing_VBG plants_NNS producing_VBG hot-dipped_JJ galvanized_JJ steel_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT marks_VBZ the_DT first_JJ so-called_JJ greenfield_NN plant_NN for_IN such_JJ production_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, it_PRP will_MD boost_VB by_IN 50_CD %_NN USX_NNP 's_POS current_JJ hot-dipped_JJ capacity_NN of_IN 1,275,000_CD tons_NNS ._.
The_DT company_NN said_VBD it_PRP does_VBZ n't_RB expect_VB the_DT new_JJ line_NN 's_POS capacity_NN to_TO adversely_RB affect_VB the_DT company_NN 's_POS existing_VBG hot-dipped_JJ galvanizing_NN lines_NNS ._.
Steelmakers_NNS have_VBP also_RB been_VBN adding_VBG capacity_NN of_IN so-called_JJ electrogalvanized_JJ steel_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ another_DT way_NN to_TO make_VB coated_VBN corrosion-resistant_JJ steel_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN the_DT hot-dipped_JJ process_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP allows_VBZ the_DT steel_NN to_TO be_VB covered_VBN with_IN a_DT thicker_JJR coat_NN of_IN zinc_NN more_RBR quickly_RB ._.
ONCE_RB YOU_PRP MAKE_VB UP_IN your_PRP$ mind_NN about_IN an_DT investment_NN ,_, the_DT rest_NN is_VBZ easy_JJ ,_, right_NN ?_.
You_PRP just_RB call_VBP your_PRP$ broker_NN and_CC say_VBP ``_`` buy_VB ''_'' or_CC ``_`` sell_VB ._. ''_''
Dream_NNP on_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN ways_NNS to_TO give_VB buy_NN and_CC sell_VB instructions_NNS to_TO a_DT broker_NN --_: and_CC just_RB as_IN many_JJ ways_NNS to_TO get_VB burned_VBN if_IN you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB know_VB what_WP you_PRP 're_VBP doing_VBG ._.
So_RB here_RB 's_VBZ a_DT rundown_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS common_JJ types_NNS of_IN market_NN orders_NNS permitted_VBN by_IN the_DT stock_NN and_CC commodity_NN exchanges_NNS ._.
Two_CD things_NNS to_TO keep_VB in_IN mind_NN :_: Not_RB all_DT exchanges_NNS accept_VBP every_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN ._.
And_CC even_RB when_WRB a_DT specific_JJ order_NN is_VBZ acceptable_JJ to_TO an_DT exchange_NN ,_, a_DT brokerage_NN firm_NN can_MD refuse_VB to_TO enter_VB it_PRP for_IN a_DT customer_NN ._.
Market_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT is_VBZ probably_RB the_DT most_RBS widely_RB used_VBN order_NN --_: and_CC the_DT one_CD most_RBS open_JJ to_TO abuse_VB by_IN unscrupulous_JJ floor_NN brokers_NNS ,_, since_IN it_PRP imposes_VBZ no_DT price_NN restrictions_NNS ._.
With_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, an_DT investor_NN tells_VBZ a_DT broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB ``_`` at_IN the_DT market_NN ._. ''_''
It_PRP 's_VBZ like_IN saying_VBG ,_, ``_`` get_VB me_PRP in_IN now_RB ''_'' or_CC ``_`` get_VB me_PRP out_IN now_RB ._. ''_''
For_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN wheat_NN is_VBZ being_VBG offered_VBN at_IN $_$ 4.065_CD and_CC bid_NN at_IN $_$ 4.060_CD ,_, a_DT market_NN order_NN to_TO buy_VB would_MD be_VB filled_VBN at_IN the_DT higher_JJR price_NN and_CC a_DT market_NN order_NN to_TO sell_VB at_IN the_DT lower_JJR price_NN ._.
A_DT recent_JJ indictment_NN alleges_VBZ that_IN some_DT floor_NN brokers_NNS at_IN the_DT two_CD largest_JJS Chicago_NNP commodity_NN exchanges_NNS used_VBD market_NN orders_NNS to_TO fill_VB customers_NNS '_POS orders_NNS at_IN unfavorable_JJ prices_NNS by_IN arranging_VBG trades_NNS with_IN fellow_NN brokers_NNS ._.
Profits_NNS realized_VBD from_IN these_DT trades_NNS would_MD then_RB be_VB shared_VBN by_IN the_DT conspiring_VBG brokers_NNS ._.
Limit_VB Order_NNP :_: Limit_VB orders_NNS are_VBP used_VBN when_WRB investors_NNS want_VBP to_TO restrict_VB the_DT amount_NN they_PRP will_MD receive_VB or_CC pay_VB for_IN an_DT investment_NN ._.
Investors_NNS do_VBP this_DT by_IN specifying_VBG a_DT minimum_JJ price_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT investment_NN may_MD be_VB sold_VBN or_CC the_DT maximum_JJ price_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB paid_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
Suppose_VB an_DT investor_NN wants_VBZ to_TO sell_VB a_DT stock_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB for_IN less_JJR than_IN $_$ 55_NN ._.
A_DT limit_NN order_NN to_TO sell_VB could_MD be_VB entered_VBN at_IN that_DT price_NN ._.
One_CD risk_NN :_: Investors_NNS may_MD regret_VB the_DT restriction_NN if_IN the_DT stock_NN reaches_VBZ 54_CD and_CC then_RB falls_VBZ ._.
Unless_IN the_DT market_NN goes_VBZ at_IN least_JJS one_CD tick_VB -LRB-_( the_DT smallest_JJS price_NN increment_NN permitted_VBN -RRB-_) beyond_IN the_DT limit_NN price_NN ,_, investors_NNS are_VBP n't_RB assured_VBN of_IN having_VBG their_PRP$ orders_NNS filled_VBN because_IN there_EX may_MD not_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ trading_NN volume_NN to_TO permit_VB filling_VBG it_PRP at_IN the_DT specified_VBN price_NN ._.
Stop_VB Order_NNP :_: Stop_VB orders_NNS tell_VB a_DT floor_NN broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN once_RB the_DT price_NN reaches_VBZ a_DT certain_JJ level_NN ._.
Once_RB the_DT price_NN reaches_VBZ that_DT level_NN ,_, a_DT stop_NN order_NN turns_VBZ into_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT order_NN is_VBZ filled_VBN at_IN whatever_WDT price_VBP the_DT broker_NN can_MD get_VB ._.
Stop_VB orders_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB called_VBN ``_`` stop-loss_NN ''_'' orders_NNS because_IN they_PRP are_VBP frequently_RB used_VBN to_TO protect_VB profits_NNS or_CC limit_NN losses_NNS ._.
While_IN stop_NN orders_NNS sound_VBP similar_JJ to_TO limit_VB orders_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT difference_NN :_: Sell_VB stops_VBZ must_MD be_VB entered_VBN at_IN a_DT price_NN below_IN the_DT current_JJ market_NN price_NN and_CC buy_VB stops_VBZ above_RB ._.
In_IN contrast_NN ,_, sell_VB limit_NN orders_NNS must_MD be_VB placed_VBN above_IN the_DT market_NN price_NN and_CC buy_VB limit_NN orders_NNS are_VBP placed_VBN below_RB ._.
The_DT crash_NN in_IN October_NNP 1987_CD and_CC last_JJ Friday_NNP 's_POS sell-off_NN painfully_RB taught_VBD some_DT investors_NNS exactly_RB what_WP stop_VBP orders_NNS will_MD and_CC wo_MD n't_RB do_VB ._.
An_DT investor_NN who_WP may_MD have_VB placed_VBN a_DT stop-loss_NN order_NN at_IN $_$ 90_CD under_IN a_DT stock_NN that_WDT was_VBD trading_VBG at_IN $_$ 100_CD a_DT share_NN on_IN the_DT Friday_NNP before_IN the_DT crash_NN was_VBD stunned_VBN to_TO discover_VB that_IN the_DT order_NN was_VBD filled_VBN at_IN $_$ 75_CD when_WRB the_DT stock_NN opened_VBD at_IN that_DT price_NN on_IN Monday_NNP ._.
Stop-Limit_NNP Order_NNP :_: Stop-limit_JJ orders_NNS turn_VBP into_IN limit_NN orders_NNS when_WRB an_DT investment_NN trades_NNS at_IN the_DT price_NN specified_VBN in_IN the_DT order_NN ._.
Unlike_IN stop_NN orders_NNS --_: which_WDT are_VBP filled_VBN at_IN the_DT market_NN price_NN when_WRB the_DT stop_NN price_NN is_VBZ hit_VBN --_: stop-limit_JJ orders_NNS demand_VBP that_IN the_DT trades_NNS be_VBP made_VBN only_RB at_IN the_DT specified_VBN price_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP ca_MD n't_RB be_VB made_VBN at_IN that_DT price_NN ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ n't_RB get_VB filled_VBN ._.
Investors_NNS who_WP wish_VBP to_TO be_VB out_IN of_IN a_DT position_NN ,_, without_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN receiving_VBG a_DT worse-than-expected_JJ price_NN from_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, may_MD use_VB this_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN to_TO specify_VB the_DT price_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT order_NN must_MD be_VB filled_VBN ._.
But_CC if_IN the_DT market_NN moves_NNS quickly_RB enough_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT broker_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_IN order_NN because_IN the_DT investment_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN the_DT specified_VBN price_NN ._.
Market-If-Touched_NNP Order_NNP :_: Market-if-touched_JJ orders_NNS are_VBP like_IN stop_NN orders_NNS in_IN that_DT they_PRP become_VBP market_NN orders_NNS if_IN a_DT specified_VBN price_NN is_VBZ reached_VBN ._.
However_RB ,_, unlike_IN a_DT buy-stop_JJ order_NN ,_, a_DT buy_NN market-if-touched_NN order_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN at_IN a_DT price_NN below_IN the_DT current_JJ price_NN ,_, while_IN a_DT sell_NN market-if-touched_NN order_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN at_IN a_DT price_NN above_IN it_PRP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT market_NN trades_NNS at_IN the_DT specified_VBN price_NN the_DT floor_NN broker_NN will_MD fill_VB it_PRP at_IN the_DT best_JJS possible_JJ price_NN ._.
Fill-Or-Kill_NNP Order_NNP :_: The_DT fill-or-kill_JJ order_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN several_RB associated_VBN with_IN the_DT timing_NN of_IN trades_NNS ._.
It_PRP instructs_VBZ a_DT broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN at_IN the_DT specified_VBN price_NN or_CC better_JJR ._.
But_CC if_IN the_DT investment_NN ca_MD n't_RB be_VB bought_VBN or_CC sold_VBN immediately_RB ,_, the_DT order_NN is_VBZ automatically_RB canceled_VBN ._.
Gregory_NNP Bessemer_NNP ,_, who_WP came_VBD in_IN second_JJ in_IN the_DT stock_NN division_NN of_IN the_DT recently_RB completed_VBN U.S._NNP Trading_NNP Championship_NNP ,_, says_VBZ he_PRP uses_VBZ fill-or-kill_JJ orders_NNS almost_RB exclusively_RB when_WRB trading_NN options_NNS ._.
``_`` I_PRP like_VB to_TO use_VB them_PRP to_TO feel_VB out_RP the_IN market_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP says_VBZ ._.
``_`` If_IN they_PRP do_VBP n't_RB fill_VB it_PRP immediately_RB ,_, then_RB I_PRP can_MD start_VB over_IN at_IN a_DT new_JJ price_NN or_CC try_VB again_RB with_IN the_DT same_JJ price_NN ._. ''_''
Not-Held_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT is_VBZ another_DT timing_NN order_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT market_NN order_NN that_WDT allows_VBZ floor_NN brokers_NNS to_TO take_VB more_JJR time_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN ,_, if_IN they_PRP think_VBP they_PRP can_MD get_VB a_DT better_JJR price_NN by_IN waiting_VBG ._.
Not-held_JJ orders_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP also_RB known_VBN as_IN ``_`` disregard_NN the_DT tape_NN ''_'' orders_NNS ,_, are_VBP always_RB done_VBN at_IN the_DT customer_NN 's_POS risk_NN ._.
One-Cancels-The-Other_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT is_VBZ really_RB two_CD orders_NNS in_IN one_CD ,_, generally_RB for_IN the_DT same_JJ security_NN or_CC commodity_NN ,_, instructing_VBG floor_NN brokers_NNS to_TO fill_VB whichever_WDT order_VBP they_PRP can_MD first_RB and_CC then_RB cancel_VB the_DT other_JJ order_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT fast-moving_JJ market_NN ,_, it_PRP prevents_VBZ an_DT investor_NN from_IN getting_VBG stuck_VBN with_IN having_VBG made_VBN two_CD trades_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ security_NN ._.
Specific-Time_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN couples_NNS many_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS described_VBN above_IN with_IN instructions_NNS that_IN the_DT order_NN must_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN at_IN or_CC by_IN a_DT certain_JJ time_NN ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT close_NN ''_'' can_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO many_VB types_NNS of_IN orders_NNS ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, ``_`` market-on-close_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' must_MD be_VB filled_VBN during_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ minutes_NNS of_IN trading_NN for_IN the_DT day_NN at_IN a_DT price_NN that_WDT is_VBZ within_IN the_DT official_NN closing_VBG range_NN of_IN prices_NNS as_IN determined_VBN by_IN the_DT exchange_NN ._.
``_`` Stop-close-only_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' are_VBP stop_VB orders_NNS that_WDT only_RB become_VB active_JJ during_IN the_DT closing_VBG minutes_NNS of_IN trading_NN ._.
``_`` Day_NNP orders_NNS ''_'' expire_VB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP entered_VBN ,_, ``_`` good-till-canceled_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' have_VBP no_DT expiration_NN date_NN ._.
Most_JJS brokers_NNS assume_VBP that_IN all_DT orders_NNS are_VBP day_NN orders_NNS unless_IN specified_VBN otherwise_RB ._.
On_IN Oct._NNP 19_CD ,_, 1987_CD ,_, some_DT investors_NNS learned_VBD the_DT consequences_NNS of_IN entering_VBG ``_`` good-til-canceled_JJ limit_NN orders_NNS ''_'' and_CC then_RB forgetting_VBG about_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP found_VBD they_PRP had_VBD bought_VBN stock_NN from_IN limit_NN orders_NNS that_IN they_PRP might_MD have_VB entered_VBN weeks_NNS or_CC months_NNS earlier_RBR and_CC had_VBD forgotten_VBN to_TO cancel_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ always_RB the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN investors_NNS to_TO keep_VB track_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS they_PRP have_VBP placed_VBN ._.
Investors_NNS who_WP change_VBP their_PRP$ mind_NN about_IN buying_VBG or_CC selling_VBG after_IN an_DT order_NN has_VBZ been_VBN filled_VBN are_VBP ,_, usually_RB ,_, stuck_VBN with_IN the_DT consequences_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Angrist_NNP writes_VBZ on_IN the_DT options_NNS and_CC commodities_NNS markets_NNS for_IN The_DT Wall_NNP Street_NNP Journal_NNP ._.
IN_IN SIZING_NNP UP_IN the_DT risks_NNS of_IN stock-market_NN investments_NNS ,_, there_EX 's_VBZ probably_RB no_DT starting_VBG place_NN better_JJR than_IN ``_`` beta_NN ._. ''_''
But_CC investors_NNS better_RBR not_RB ignore_VB its_PRP$ limitations_NNS ,_, either_RB ._.
Beta_NNP is_VBZ a_DT handy_JJ gauge_NN that_IN measures_VBZ the_DT volatility_NN of_IN a_DT stock_NN or_CC stock_NN mutual_JJ fund_NN ._.
For_IN any_DT given_VBN move_NN in_IN the_DT overall_JJ market_NN ,_, it_PRP suggests_VBZ how_WRB steeply_RB that_IN particular_JJ issue_NN might_MD rise_VB or_CC fall_NN ._.
Beta_JJ figures_NNS are_VBP widely_RB available_JJ and_CC easy_JJ to_TO interpret_VB ._.
The_DT beta_NN of_IN the_DT broad_JJ market_NN ,_, typically_RB defined_VBN as_IN the_DT Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500-stock_JJ index_NN ,_, is_VBZ always_RB 1.0_CD ._.
So_RB a_DT stock_NN with_IN a_DT beta_NN of_IN 0.5_CD is_VBZ half_NN as_IN volatile_JJ ,_, one_CD at_IN 1.5_CD is_VBZ 50_CD %_NN more_RBR volatile_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB on_RB ._.
Cautious_JJ investors_NNS should_MD generally_RB go_VB with_IN stocks_NNS that_WDT have_VBP low_JJ betas_NNS ._.
Go_VB with_IN high-beta_JJ stocks_NNS to_TO get_VB the_DT biggest_JJS payoff_NN from_IN a_DT bet_NN on_IN a_DT bull_NN market_NN ._.
Remember_VB ,_, though_RB ,_, that_DT beta_NN also_RB has_VBZ important_JJ limitations_NNS ._.
``_`` Beta_NNP is_VBZ only_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT risk_NN in_IN a_DT stock_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ William_NNP F._NNP Sharpe_NNP ,_, the_DT Stanford_NNP University_NNP emeritus_NN professor_NN who_WP developed_VBD the_DT measure_NN ._.
``_`` There_EX is_VBZ risk_NN that_WDT is_VBZ not_RB associated_VBN with_IN market_NN moves_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT beta_NN does_VBZ n't_RB tell_VB you_PRP the_DT magnitude_NN of_IN that_DT ._. ''_''
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, beta_NN does_VBZ n't_RB measure_VB the_DT company_NN -_: and_CC industry-specific_JJ risk_NN associated_VBN with_IN an_DT individual_JJ stock_NN ._.
That_DT ``_`` business_NN ''_'' risk_NN is_VBZ very_RB significant_JJ for_IN an_DT investor_NN with_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ stocks_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP virtually_RB disappears_VBZ in_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC well-diversified_JJ portfolio_NN ._.
Beta_NNP is_VBZ also_RB a_DT poor_JJ indicator_NN of_IN the_DT risk_NN in_IN stock_NN groups_NNS that_WDT march_VBP to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ drummer_NN ._.
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, the_DT prices_NNS of_IN gold_NN and_CC other_JJ precious-metals_NNS stocks_NNS shoot_VBP up_IN and_CC down_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT stocks_NNS tend_VBP to_TO have_VB low_JJ betas_NNS because_IN their_PRP$ moves_NNS are_VBP not_RB market-inspired_JJ ._.
Concern_NN that_IN investors_NNS could_MD misinterpret_VB such_JJ readings_NNS led_VBD the_DT American_NNP Association_NNP of_IN Individual_JJ Investors_NNS to_TO eliminate_VB beta_NN figures_NNS for_IN precious-metals_NNS funds_NNS in_IN the_DT 1989_CD edition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ mutual-fund_JJ guide_NN ._.
``_`` Our_PRP$ fear_NN was_VBD people_NNS would_MD look_VB just_RB at_IN the_DT beta_NN -LCB-_( of_IN a_DT gold_NN fund_NN -RCB-_) and_CC say_VBP here_RB is_VBZ an_DT investment_NN with_IN very_RB low_JJ risk_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ John_NNP Markese_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN research_NN for_IN the_DT Chicago-based_JJ group_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN reality_NN it_PRP 's_VBZ very_RB volatile_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT movements_NNS are_VBP not_RB because_IN of_IN market_NN movements_NNS ._.
READY_NNP TO_TO REVIEW_NNP the_DT riskiness_NN of_IN your_PRP$ investment_NN portfolio_NN ?_.
First_RB ,_, a_DT pop_NN quiz_NN ._.

Indexing_NN for_IN the_DT most_RBS part_NN has_VBZ involved_VBN simply_RB buying_VBG and_CC then_RB holding_VBG stocks_NNS in_IN the_DT correct_JJ mix_NN to_TO mirror_VB a_DT stock_NN market_NN barometer_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500-stock_JJ index_NN ,_, and_CC match_VB its_PRP$ performance_NN ._.

``_`` Indexing_NN has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT most_RBS single_JJ successful_JJ investment_NN concept_NN in_IN the_DT last_JJ decade_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT index_NN money_NN has_VBZ been_VBN just_RB sort_NN of_IN sitting_VBG there_EX ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Seth_NNP M._NNP Lynn_NNP ,_, president_NN of_IN Axe_NNP Core_NNP Investors_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, an_DT indexer_NN based_VBN in_IN Tarrytown_NNP ,_, N.Y_NNP ._.
``_`` Now_RB the_DT interest_NN is_VBZ in_IN what_WP else_RB can_MD I_PRP do_VB with_IN that_DT money_NN ._. ''_''
Among_IN the_DT souped-up_JJ indexing_NN strategies_NNS :_: Indexed_JJ portfolios_NNS can_MD be_VB built_VBN around_IN thousands_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS ,_, or_CC just_RB a_DT few_JJ dozen_NN ,_, rather_RB than_IN being_VBG restricted_VBN to_TO the_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD companies_NNS ._.
They_PRP can_MD ignore_VB the_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD stocks_NNS altogether_RB and_CC focus_NN on_IN particular_JJ types_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN smaller_JJR companies_NNS ,_, those_DT paying_VBG high_JJ dividends_NNS or_CC companies_NNS in_IN a_DT particular_JJ industry_NN ,_, state_NN or_CC country_NN ._.

One_CD reason_NN for_IN these_DT hybrids_NNS is_VBZ that_DT indexing_NN 's_POS rapid_JJ growth_NN is_VBZ slowing_VBG ,_, particularly_RB for_IN those_DT ``_`` plain_JJ vanilla_NN ''_'' funds_VBZ that_DT mirror_NN the_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD ._.

-LRB-_( After_IN tripling_VBG in_IN size_NN in_IN the_DT past_JJ five_CD years_NNS ,_, index_NN funds_NNS now_RB hold_VBP about_IN 20_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT stock_NN owned_VBN by_IN pension_NN funds_NNS ._. -RRB-_)
A_DT further_JJ problem_NN is_VBZ razor-thin_JJ profits_NNS ._.

The_DT Tire_NNP King_NNP

Analysts_NNS noted_VBD that_IN the_DT disappointing_JJ results_NNS do_VBP n't_RB reflect_VB lower_JJR prices_NNS for_IN steel_NN products_NNS ._.

The_DT ``_`` seismic_JJ ''_'' activity_NN of_IN a_DT financial_JJ market_NN bears_VBZ a_DT resemblance_NN to_TO the_DT seismic_JJ activity_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN ._.
When_WRB things_NNS are_VBP quiet_JJ -LRB-_( low_JJ volatility_NN -RRB-_) ,_, the_DT structures_NNS on_IN which_WDT markets_NNS stand_VBP can_MD be_VB relatively_RB inefficient_JJ and_CC still_RB perform_VB their_PRP$ functions_NNS adequately_RB ._.
However_RB ,_, when_WRB powerful_JJ forces_NNS start_VBP shaking_VBG the_DT market_NN 's_POS structure_NN ,_, the_DT more_JJR ``_`` earthquake-resistant_JJ ''_'' it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, the_DT better_JJR its_PRP$ chance_NN for_IN survival_NN ._.
America_NNP 's_POS financial_JJ markets_NNS do_VBP not_RB yet_RB have_VB all_PDT the_DT required_VBN modern_JJ features_NNS required_VBN to_TO make_VB them_PRP fully_RB ``_`` aftershock-resistant_JJ ._. ''_''
Investors_NNS lack_VBP equal_JJ access_NN to_TO the_DT markets_NNS '_POS trading_NN arena_NN and_CC its_PRP$ information_NN ._.
That_DT structural_JJ lack_NN is_VBZ crucial_JJ because_IN investors_NNS are_VBP the_DT only_JJ source_NN of_IN market_NN liquidity_NN ._.
And_CC liquidity_NN is_VBZ what_WP markets_VBZ need_VBP to_TO damp_VB quakes_NNS and_CC aftershocks_NNS ._.
In_IN today_NN 's_POS markets_NNS ,_, specialists_NNS -LRB-_( on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP -RRB-_) and_CC ``_`` upstairs_NN ''_'' market_NN makers_NNS -LRB-_( in_IN the_DT over-the-counter_JJ market_NN -RRB-_) are_VBP the_DT only_JJ market_NN participants_NNS allowed_VBN to_TO play_VB a_DT direct_JJ role_NN in_IN the_DT price-determination_JJ process_NN ._.

Last_NNP Friday_NNP the_DT 13th_JJ -LRB-_( as_RB well_RB as_IN two_CD years_NNS ago_RB this_DT week_NN -RRB-_) the_DT markets_NNS became_VBD unlinked_JJ ._.
When_WRB that_WDT happened_VBD ,_, ``_`` seismic_JJ ''_'' tremors_NNS of_IN fear_NN --_: much_JJ like_IN the_DT shock_NN waves_NNS created_VBN by_IN an_DT earthquake_NN --_: coursed_VBN through_IN the_DT market_NN and_CC increased_VBD the_DT market_NN 's_POS volatility_NN ._.

And_CC in_IN financial_JJ markets_NNS ,_, irrational_JJ behavior_NN is_VBZ sometimes_RB translated_VBN into_IN catastrophe_NN ._.
When_WRB market_NN tremors_NNS start_VBP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ crucial_JJ that_IN as_IN much_JJ information_NN about_IN transaction_NN prices_NNS and_CC the_DT supply-demand_JJ curve_NN -LRB-_( buy_VB and_CC sell_VB orders_NNS at_IN various_JJ prices_NNS -RRB-_) be_VB made_VBN available_JJ to_TO all_DT ,_, not_RB just_RB to_TO market_VB makers_NNS ._.
Because_IN of_IN a_DT lack_NN of_IN information_NN and_CC access_NN ,_, many_JJ investors_NNS --_: including_VBG the_DT very_JJ ones_NNS whose_WP$ buying_VBG power_NN could_MD restore_VB stability_NN and_CC damp_VB volatility_NN --_: are_VBP forced_VBN to_TO stand_VB on_IN the_DT sidelines_NNS when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP most_RBS needed_VBN ,_, because_IN of_IN their_PRP$ ignorance_NN of_IN important_JJ market_NN information_NN ._.
To_TO add_VB aftershock-damping_JJ power_NN to_TO America_NNP 's_POS markets_NNS ,_, a_DT modern_NN ,_, electronic_JJ trading_NN system_NN should_MD be_VB implemented_VBN that_WDT permits_VBZ equal_JJ access_NN to_TO the_DT trading_NN arena_NN -LRB-_( and_CC the_DT information_NN that_WDT would_MD automatically_RB accompany_VB such_JJ access_NN -RRB-_) by_IN investors_NNS --_: particularly_RB institutional_JJ investors_NNS ._.
Contrary_JJ to_TO some_DT opinions_NNS ,_, the_DT trading_NN activities_NNS of_IN specialists_NNS and_CC other_JJ market_NN makers_NNS do_VBP not_RB provide_VB liquidity_NN to_TO the_DT market_NN as_IN a_DT whole_NN ._.
What_WP market_NN makers_NNS provide_VBP is_VBZ immediacy_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB valuable_JJ service_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT market_NN attribute_VBP --_: the_DT ability_NN to_TO absorb_VB selling_VBG orders_NNS without_IN causing_VBG significant_JJ price_NN changes_NNS in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN news_NN ._.
Market_NN makers_NNS buy_VBP what_WP investors_NNS wish_VBP to_TO sell_VB ;_: their_PRP$ business_NN is_VBZ reselling_VBG these_DT unwanted_JJ positions_NNS as_RB quickly_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO other_JJ investors_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN a_DT profit_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, while_IN any_DT one_CD customer_NN may_MD purchase_VB immediacy_NN by_IN selling_VBG to_TO a_DT market_NN maker_NN -LRB-_( which_WDT is_VBZ micro-liquidity_NN for_IN the_DT investor_NN -RRB-_) ,_, the_DT market_NN as_IN a_DT whole_JJ remains_NNS in_IN the_DT same_JJ circumstances_NNS it_PRP was_VBD before_IN the_DT transaction_NN :_: The_DT unwanted_JJ position_NN is_VBZ still_RB an_DT unwanted_JJ position_NN ;_: only_RB the_DT identity_NN of_IN the_DT seller_NN has_VBZ changed_VBN ._.
In_IN fact_NN it_PRP can_MD be_VB argued_VBN that_IN increasing_VBG capital_NN commitments_NNS by_IN market_NN makers_NNS -LRB-_( a_DT result_NN of_IN some_DT post-1987_JJ crash_NN studies_NNS -RRB-_) also_RB increases_NNS market_NN volatility_NN ,_, since_IN the_DT more_JJR securities_NNS are_VBP held_VBN by_IN market_NN makers_NNS at_IN any_DT given_VBN time_NN ,_, the_DT more_JJR selling_VBG pressure_NN is_VBZ overhanging_VBG the_DT market_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Peake_NNP is_VBZ chairman_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ consulting_NN company_NN in_IN Englewood_NNP ,_, N.J_NNP ._.
NOW_RB YOU_PRP SEE_VBP IT_PRP ,_, now_RB you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB ._.
The_DT recession_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ ._.
The_DT economy_NN 's_POS stutter_NN steps_NNS leave_VBP investors_NNS wondering_VBG whether_IN things_NNS are_VBP slowing_VBG down_RB or_CC speeding_VBG up_RB ._.
So_RB often_RB are_VBP government_NN statistics_NNS revised_VBN that_IN they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO resemble_VB a_DT spinning_VBG weather_NN vane_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT past_JJ seven_CD years_NNS ,_, investors_NNS have_VBP had_VBN the_DT wind_NN at_IN their_PRP$ backs_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT generally_RB growing_VBG economy_NN ._.
Some_DT may_MD have_VB forgotten_VBN --_: and_CC some_DT younger_JJR ones_NNS may_MD never_RB have_VB experienced_VBN --_: what_WP it_PRP 's_VBZ like_VB to_TO invest_VB during_IN a_DT recession_NN ._.
Different_JJ tactics_NNS are_VBP called_VBN for_IN ,_, as_IN losing_VBG money_NN becomes_VBZ easier_JJR and_CC making_VBG money_NN becomes_VBZ tougher_JJR ._.
For_IN those_DT investors_NNS who_WP believe_VBP --_: or_CC fear_NN --_: that_IN 1990_CD will_MD be_VB a_DT recession_NN year_NN ,_, many_JJ economists_NNS and_CC money_NN managers_NNS agree_VBP on_IN steps_NNS that_WDT can_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO lower_JJR the_DT risks_NNS in_IN a_DT portfolio_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT nutshell_NN ,_, pros_NNS advise_VBP investors_NNS who_WP expect_VBP a_DT slowdown_NN to_TO hold_VB fewer_JJR stocks_NNS than_IN usual_JJ and_CC to_TO favor_VB shares_NNS of_IN big_JJ companies_NNS in_IN ``_`` defensive_JJ ''_'' industries_NNS ._.
A_DT heavy_JJ dose_NN of_IN cash_NN is_VBZ prescribed_VBN ,_, along_IN with_IN a_DT heavier-than-usual_JJ allotment_NN to_TO bonds_NNS --_: preferably_RB government_NN bonds_NNS ._.
It_PRP 's_VBZ tempting_JJ to_TO think_VB these_DT defensive_JJ steps_NNS can_MD be_VB delayed_VBN until_IN a_DT recession_NN is_VBZ clearly_RB at_IN hand_NN ._.
But_CC that_DT may_MD not_RB be_VB possible_JJ ,_, because_IN recessions_NNS often_RB take_VBP investors_NNS by_IN surprise_NN ._.
``_`` They_PRP always_RB seem_VBP to_TO come_VB a_DT bit_NN later_RB than_IN you_PRP expect_VBP ._.
When_WRB they_PRP do_VBP hit_VBD ,_, they_PRP hit_VBD fast_RB ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ David_NNP A._NNP Wyss_NNP ,_, chief_JJ financial_JJ economist_NN at_IN the_DT Data_NNP Resources_NNPS division_NN of_IN McGraw-Hill_NNP Inc_NNP ._.

The_DT reason_NN is_VBZ simple_JJ ,_, Mr._NNP Wyss_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` Interest_NN rates_NNS almost_RB always_RB decline_VBP during_IN recession_NN ._. ''_''
As_RB surely_RB as_IN a_DT seesaw_NN tilts_VBZ ,_, falling_VBG interest_NN rates_NNS force_VBP up_IN the_DT price_NN of_IN previously_RB issued_VBN bonds_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP worth_RB more_JJR because_IN they_PRP pay_VBP higher_JJR interest_NN than_IN newly_RB issued_VBN bonds_NNS do_VBP ._.
That_DT effect_NN holds_VBZ true_JJ for_IN both_DT short-term_JJ and_CC long-term_JJ bonds_NNS ._.
But_CC short-term_JJ bonds_NNS ca_MD n't_RB rise_VB too_RB much_JJ ,_, because_IN everyone_NN knows_VBZ they_PRP will_MD be_VB redeemed_VBN at_IN a_DT preset_JJ price_NN fairly_RB soon_RB ._.
Long-term_JJ bonds_NNS ,_, with_IN many_JJ years_NNS left_VBN before_IN maturity_NN ,_, swing_NN more_RBR widely_RB in_IN price_NN ._.
But_CC not_RB just_RB any_DT bonds_NNS will_MD do_VB ._.
Corporate_JJ bonds_NNS ``_`` are_VBP usually_RB not_RB a_DT good_JJ bet_NN in_IN a_DT recession_NN ,_, ''_'' Mr._NNP Wyss_NNP says_VBZ ._.
As_IN times_NNS get_VBP tougher_JJR ,_, investors_NNS fret_VBP about_IN whether_IN companies_NNS will_MD have_VB enough_JJ money_NN to_TO pay_VB their_PRP$ debts_NNS ._.
This_DT hurts_VBZ the_DT price_NN of_IN corporate_JJ bonds_NNS ._.
Also_RB ,_, he_PRP notes_VBZ ,_, ``_`` most_RBS corporate_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP callable_JJ ._. ''_''
That_DT means_VBZ that_IN a_DT corporation_NN ,_, after_IN a_DT specified_VBN amount_NN of_IN time_NN has_VBZ passed_VBN ,_, can_MD buy_VB back_RB its_PRP$ bonds_NNS by_IN paying_VBG investors_NNS the_DT face_NN value_NN -LRB-_( plus_CC ,_, in_IN some_DT cases_NNS ,_, a_DT sweetener_NN -RRB-_) ._.
When_WRB interest_NN rates_NNS have_VBP dropped_VBN ,_, it_PRP makes_VBZ sense_NN for_IN corporations_NNS to_TO do_VB just_RB that_IN ;_: they_PRP then_RB save_VBP on_IN interest_NN costs_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT investors_NNS are_VBP left_VBN stranded_VBN with_IN money_NN to_TO reinvest_VB at_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB interest_NN rates_NNS are_VBP puny_JJ ._.
If_IN corporate_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP bad_JJ in_IN recessions_NNS ,_, junk_NN bonds_NNS are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB the_DT worst_JJS of_IN all_DT ._.
It_PRP 's_VBZ an_DT ``_`` absolute_JJ necessity_NN ''_'' to_TO get_VB out_IN of_IN junk_NN bonds_NNS when_WRB a_DT recession_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT offing_NN ,_, says_VBZ Avner_NNP Arbel_NNP ,_, professor_NN of_IN finance_NN at_IN Cornell_NNP University_NNP ._.
``_`` Such_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP very_RB sensitive_JJ to_TO the_DT downside_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT could_MD be_VB a_DT disaster_NN ._. ''_''
Municipal_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP generally_RB a_DT bit_NN safer_JJR than_IN corporate_JJ bonds_NNS in_IN a_DT recession_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB as_RB safe_JJ as_IN bonds_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT federal_JJ government_NN ._.
During_IN an_DT economic_JJ slump_NN ,_, local_JJ tax_NN revenues_NNS often_RB go_VBP down_RB ,_, raising_VBG the_DT risks_NNS associated_VBN with_IN at_IN least_JJS some_DT municipals_NNS ._.
And_CC ,_, like_IN corporates_NNS ,_, many_JJ municipal_JJ bonds_NNS are_VBP callable_JJ ._.
But_CC a_DT few_JJ experts_NNS ,_, going_VBG against_IN the_DT consensus_NN ,_, do_VBP n't_RB think_VB bonds_NNS would_MD help_VB investors_NNS even_RB if_IN a_DT recession_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT offing_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN these_DT is_VBZ Jeffrey_NNP L._NNP Beach_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN research_NN for_IN Underwood_NNP Neuhaus_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, a_DT brokerage_NN house_NN in_IN Houston_NNP ,_, who_WP thinks_VBZ that_IN ``_`` we_PRP 're_VBP either_DT in_NN a_DT recession_NN or_CC about_IN to_TO go_VB into_IN one_CD ._. What_WP 's_VBZ more_JJR ,_, he_PRP thinks_VBZ this_DT could_MD be_VB a_DT nastier_JJR recession_NN than_IN usual_JJ :_: ``_`` Once_RB the_DT downturn_NN comes_VBZ ,_, it_PRP 's_VBZ going_VBG to_TO be_VB very_RB hard_JJ to_TO reverse_VB ._. ''_''

Greg_NNP Confair_NNP ,_, president_NN of_IN Sigma_NNP Financial_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN Allentown_NNP ,_, Pa._NNP ,_, also_RB recommends_VBZ that_IN investors_NNS go_VBP heavily_RB for_IN cash_NN ._.

``_`` This_DT late_RB in_IN an_DT expansion_NN ,_, ''_'' the_DT economy_NN tends_VBZ to_TO veer_VB off_IN either_DT into_IN damaging_JJ inflation_NN or_CC into_IN a_DT recession_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Confair_NNP says_VBZ ._.

He_PRP believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT task_NN facing_VBG Fed_NNP Chairman_NNP Alan_NNP Greenspan_NNP is_VBZ so_RB difficult_JJ that_IN it_PRP resembles_VBZ ``_`` juggling_VBG a_DT double-bladed_JJ ax_NN and_CC a_DT buzz_NN saw_VBD ._. ''_''

It_PRP comes_VBZ down_RB to_TO a_DT question_NN of_IN whether_IN to_TO try_VB to_TO ``_`` time_NN ''_'' the_DT market_NN ._.
For_IN people_NNS who_WP can_MD ride_VB out_RP market_NN waves_NNS through_IN good_JJ times_NNS and_CC bad_JJ ,_, stocks_NNS have_VBP been_VBN rewarding_JJ long-term_JJ investments_NNS ._.
Most_JJS studies_NNS show_VBP that_IN buy-and-hold_JJ investors_NNS historically_RB have_VBP earned_VBN an_DT annual_JJ return_NN from_IN stocks_NNS of_IN 9_CD %_NN to_TO 10_CD %_NN ,_, including_VBG both_DT dividends_NNS and_CC price_NN appreciation_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ well_RB above_IN what_WP bonds_NNS or_CC bank_NN certificates_NNS have_VBP paid_VBN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, because_IN no_DT one_CD knows_VBZ for_IN sure_JJ just_RB when_WRB a_DT recession_NN is_VBZ coming_VBG ,_, some_DT analysts_NNS think_VBP investors_NNS should_MD n't_RB even_RB worry_VB too_RB much_JJ about_IN timing_NN ._.
``_`` Trying_VBG to_TO time_VB the_DT economy_NN is_VBZ a_DT mistake_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ David_NNP Katz_NNP ,_, chief_JJ investment_NN officer_NN of_IN Value_NNP Matrix_NNP Management_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Katz_NNP notes_VBZ that_IN some_DT economists_NNS have_VBP been_VBN predicting_VBG a_DT recession_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD years_NNS ._.

THE_DT SALES_NNP PITCH_NNP could_MD n't_RB sound_VB better_JJR ._.

``_`` A_DT lot_NN of_IN this_DT stuff_NN really_RB is_VBZ in_IN untested_JJ waters_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Owen_NNP Carney_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN the_DT investment_NN securities_NNS division_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP comptroller_NN of_IN the_DT currency_NN ._.

And_CC the_DT biggest_JJS volume_NN this_DT year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN on_IN securities_NNS backed_VBN by_IN credit-card_NN receivables_NN ,_, sometimes_RB known_VBN as_IN ``_`` plastic_NN bonds_NNS ._. ''_''

The_DT result_NN is_VBZ a_DT $_$ 45_CD billion_CD market_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO Securities_NNP Data_NNP Co_NNP ._.
That_DT includes_VBZ more_JJR than_IN $_$ 9.5_CD billion_CD issued_VBN through_IN August_NNP of_IN this_DT year_NN ,_, up_IN sharply_RB from_IN $_$ 6.5_CD billion_CD in_IN the_DT comparable_JJ 1988_CD period_NN --_: and_CC more_JJR than_IN in_IN all_DT of_IN 1987_CD ._.
Most_JJS issues_NNS have_VBP been_VBN sold_VBN to_TO professional_JJ money_NN managers_NNS ,_, pension_NN funds_NNS ,_, bank_NN trust_NN departments_NNS and_CC other_JJ institutions_NNS ._.
But_CC wealthy_JJ individuals_NNS also_RB have_VBP been_VBN jumping_VBG in_IN ,_, and_CC lately_RB brokers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN pushing_VBG smaller_JJR investors_NNS into_IN the_DT asset-backed_JJ market_NN ._.
The_DT entry_NN fee_NN is_VBZ affordable_JJ :_: Issues_NNS typically_RB are_VBP sold_VBN in_IN minimum_JJ denominations_NNS of_IN $_$ 1,000_CD ._.
``_`` We_PRP expect_VBP additional_JJ offerings_NNS ''_'' of_IN asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS targeted_VBN toward_IN individual_JJ investors_NNS ,_, says_VBZ Bill_NNP Addiss_NNP ,_, a_DT senior_JJ vice_NN president_NN at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP Inc_NNP ._.
The_DT process_NN typically_RB begins_VBZ when_WRB an_DT institution_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN Citibank_NNP or_CC Sears_NNP ,_, Roebuck_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, takes_VBZ a_DT pool_NN of_IN credit-card_NN or_CC other_JJ receivables_NN and_CC sells_VBZ them_PRP to_TO a_DT specially_RB created_VBN trust_NN ._.
The_DT trust_NN then_RB issues_VBZ securities_NNS --_: generally_RB due_JJ in_IN five_CD years_NNS or_CC less_JJR --_: that_WDT are_VBP underwritten_VBN by_IN Wall_NNP Street_NNP brokerage_NN firms_NNS and_CC offered_VBN to_TO investors_NNS ._.

Enthusiasts_NNS say_VBP the_DT booming_JJ market_NN has_VBZ opened_VBN up_IN a_DT valuable_JJ new_JJ source_NN of_IN funds_NNS to_TO issuers_NNS ,_, while_IN providing_VBG a_DT valuable_JJ new_JJ investment_NN for_IN individuals_NNS and_CC institutions_NNS ._.

But_CC skeptics_NNS question_VBP whether_IN asset-backed_JJ bonds_NNS offer_VBP sufficient_JJ rewards_NNS to_TO compensate_VB for_IN the_DT extra_JJ risks_NNS ._.
Consider_VB a_DT $_$ 500_CD million_CD offering_NN of_IN 9_CD %_NN securities_NNS issued_VBD last_JJ spring_NN and_CC backed_VBN by_IN Citibank_NNP credit-card_NN receivables_NN ._.
The_DT triple-A-rated_JJ issue_NN offered_VBD a_DT yield_NN of_IN only_RB about_IN 0.5_CD percentage_NN point_NN above_IN four-year_JJ Treasury_NNP issues_NNS ._.
On_IN a_DT $_$ 10,000_CD investment_NN ,_, that_DT 's_VBZ a_DT difference_NN of_IN only_RB $_$ 50_CD a_DT year_NN ._.
That_DT kind_NN of_IN spread_NN can_MD be_VB critical_JJ for_IN money_NN managers_NNS who_WP buy_VBP bonds_NNS in_IN large_JJ quantities_NNS and_CC whose_WP$ livelihood_NN depends_VBZ on_IN outperforming_VBG the_DT money_NN manager_NN across_IN the_DT street_NN ._.
But_CC for_IN individuals_NNS who_WP buy_VBP much_RB smaller_JJR amounts_NNS and_CC care_NN less_JJR about_IN relative_JJ performance_NN than_IN in_IN preserving_VBG what_WP they_PRP have_VBP ,_, that_DT margin_NN is_VBZ meaningless_JJ ._.
``_`` If_IN you_PRP 're_VBP in_IN the_DT bond_NN business_NN playing_VBG the_DT relative-performance_JJ derby_NN ,_, then_RB even_RB an_DT extra_JJ 25_CD basis_NN points_NNS -LRB-_( 0.25_CD percentage_NN point_NN -RRB-_) becomes_VBZ an_DT important_JJ consideration_NN on_IN a_DT career_NN basis_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Grant_NNP ._.
``_`` But_CC if_IN you_PRP 're_VBP an_DT individual_JJ investing_NN money_NN and_CC trying_VBG to_TO get_VB it_PRP back_RB again_RB ,_, then_RB that_WDT is_VBZ n't_RB of_IN overwhelming_JJ importance_NN ._. ''_''
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT interest_NN on_IN asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS is_VBZ fully_RB taxable_JJ ,_, while_IN interest_NN on_IN Treasury_NNP issues_NNS is_VBZ tax-free_JJ at_IN the_DT state_NN and_CC local_JJ level_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ why_WRB some_DT investment_NN managers_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Alex_NNP Powers_NNP ,_, a_DT vice_NN president_NN of_IN Chase_NNP Manhattan_NNP Bank_NNP 's_POS private_JJ banking_NN division_NN ,_, do_VBP n't_RB recommend_VB most_RBS asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS for_IN individuals_NNS in_IN high-tax_JJ states_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN New_NNP York_NNP or_CC California_NNP ._.
But_CC Mr._NNP Powers_NNP has_VBZ purchased_VBN asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS for_IN individuals_NNS with_IN tax-deferred_JJ accounts_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN retirement_NN plans_NNS ._.
He_PRP points_VBZ out_RP that_IN institutions_NNS buying_VBG asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS in_IN large_JJ quantities_NNS can_MD earn_VB higher_JJR spreads_VBZ over_IN Treasurys_NNPS than_IN individuals_NNS buying_VBG smaller_JJR amounts_NNS ._.
Another_DT concern_NN is_VBZ liquidity_NN ,_, or_CC how_WRB easily_RB a_DT security_NN can_MD be_VB converted_VBN into_IN cash_NN ._.
The_DT secondary_JJ ,_, or_CC resale_NN ,_, market_NN for_IN asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS is_VBZ relatively_RB new_JJ and_CC much_RB less_RBR active_JJ than_IN for_IN Treasury_NNP issues_NNS ._.
That_DT could_MD make_VB it_PRP tricky_JJ for_IN investors_NNS who_WP need_VBP to_TO sell_VB their_PRP$ holdings_NNS quickly_RB before_IN the_DT securities_NNS mature_JJ ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ particularly_RB true_JJ ,_, analysts_NNS say_VBP ,_, for_IN certain_JJ of_IN the_DT securities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN those_DT backed_VBN by_IN time-share_JJ loans_NNS ._.
``_`` You_PRP could_MD see_VB massive_JJ gyrations_NNS here_RB because_IN it_PRP 's_VBZ such_JJ a_DT thinly_RB traded_VBN market_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Jonathan_NNP S._NNP Paris_NNP ,_, a_DT vice_NN president_NN of_IN European_JJ Investors_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, a_DT New_NNP York_NNP investment-management_NN firm_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, an_DT investor_NN who_WP wants_VBZ to_TO know_VB the_DT daily_JJ value_NN of_IN Treasury_NNP bonds_NNS ,_, or_CC corporate_JJ bonds_NNS traded_VBN on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP ,_, can_MD simply_RB check_VB newspaper_NN listings_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP n't_RB any_DT such_JJ listings_NNS for_IN asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS ._.
Evaluating_VBG asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS poses_VBZ another_DT problem_NN ._.
Investors_NNS ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, may_MD mistakenly_RB assume_VB that_IN the_DT bank_NN or_CC company_NN that_IN originally_RB held_VBN the_DT assets_NNS is_VBZ guaranteeing_VBG the_DT securities_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ n't_RB ._.
The_DT front_NN cover_NN of_IN the_DT prospectus_NN for_IN the_DT Citibank_NNP credit-card_NN receivables_NN offering_NN points_NNS out_IN in_IN bold_JJ capital_NN letters_NNS that_IN the_DT certificates_NNS represent_VBP an_DT interest_NN only_RB in_IN the_DT specially_RB created_VBN trust_NN and_CC ``_`` do_VBP not_RB represent_VB interests_NNS in_IN or_CC obligations_NNS of_IN the_DT banks_NNS ,_, Citibank_NNP N.A._NNP ,_, Citicorp_NNP or_CC any_DT affiliate_NN thereof_RB ._. ''_''
In_IN other_JJ words_NNS ,_, if_IN there_EX 's_VBZ a_DT problem_NN ,_, do_VBP n't_RB expect_VB Citibank_NNP to_TO come_VB to_TO the_DT rescue_NN ._.
The_DT prospectus_NN also_RB notes_VBZ that_IN the_DT securities_NNS are_VBP not_RB guaranteed_VBN by_IN any_DT government_NN agency_NN ._.
That_DT means_VBZ investors_NNS have_VBP to_TO focus_VB on_IN the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT debt_NN that_WDT lies_VBZ beneath_IN the_DT securities_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN on_IN the_DT credit_NN enhancement_NN for_IN the_DT issue_NN and_CC the_DT credit_NN ratings_NNS the_DT issue_NN has_VBZ received_VBN ._.
That_DT also_RB is_VBZ n't_RB easy_JJ ._.
Take_VB the_DT ``_`` credit_NN enhancements_NNS ,_, ''_'' which_WDT typically_RB include_VBP a_DT bank_NN letter_NN of_IN credit_NN or_CC insurance_NN from_IN a_DT bond-insurance_JJ company_NN ._.
The_DT letter_NN of_IN credit_NN typically_RB is_VBZ not_RB offered_VBN by_IN the_DT bank_NN selling_VBG the_DT assets_NNS to_TO back_RB the_DT securities_NNS ._.
Nor_CC does_VBZ it_PRP cover_VBP the_DT entire_JJ portfolio_NN ._.
Details_NNS of_IN credit_NN enhancements_NNS vary_VBP widely_RB from_IN issue_NN to_TO issue_VB ._.
Still_RB ,_, they_PRP play_VBP a_DT crucial_JJ role_NN in_IN winning_VBG top_JJ ratings_NNS for_IN most_RBS asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS --_: which_WDT in_IN turn_NN is_VBZ why_WRB the_DT yield_NN above_IN Treasurys_NNPS is_VBZ so_RB slim_JJ ._.
But_CC skeptics_NNS ask_VBP why_WRB you_PRP should_MD bother_VB buying_VBG this_DT stuff_NN when_WRB you_PRP can_MD get_VB only_RB slightly_RB lower_JJR yields_NNS on_IN government-guaranteed_JJ paper_NN ._.
When_WRB you_PRP buy_VBP an_DT asset-backed_JJ issue_NN ,_, you_PRP take_VBP the_DT risk_NN that_IN a_DT bank_NN or_CC an_DT insurer_NN could_MD run_VB into_IN unexpected_JJ difficulties_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT bank_NN 's_POS credit_NN rating_NN was_VBD lowered_VBN because_IN of_IN ,_, say_VBP ,_, its_PRP$ loans_NNS to_TO Third_NNP World_NNP nations_NNS ,_, that_WDT could_MD also_RB affect_VB the_DT ratings_NNS ,_, liquidity_NN and_CC prices_NNS of_IN the_DT asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS that_IN the_DT bank_NN supports_NNS ._.
Underwriters_NNS insist_VBP these_DT issues_NNS are_VBP constructed_VBN to_TO withstand_VB extremely_RB tough_JJ economic_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
But_CC despite_IN the_DT credit_NN enhancements_NNS ,_, despite_IN the_DT high_JJ ratings_NNS ,_, some_DT money_NN managers_NNS still_RB worry_VBP that_IN a_DT recession_NN could_MD wreak_VB havoc_NN on_IN the_DT underlying_VBG assets_NNS ._.
At_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB Americans_NNPS are_VBP leveraged_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ eyeballs_NNS ,_, asset-backed_JJ investors_NNS may_MD be_VB taking_VBG a_DT heady_JJ gamble_NN that_IN consumers_NNS will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO repay_VB loans_NNS in_IN hard_JJ times_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT very_RB least_JJS ,_, a_DT recession_NN would_MD prompt_VB investors_NNS to_TO buy_VB the_DT highest-quality_JJ bonds_NNS they_PRP can_MD find_VB --_: that_DT is_VBZ ,_, Treasurys_NNPS ._.
That_DT could_MD widen_VB the_DT yield_NN spread_NN between_IN Treasurys_NNPS and_CC asset-backed_JJ securities_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN make_NN it_PRP tougher_JJR to_TO unload_VB the_DT latter_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP could_MD be_VB much_RB worse_JJR ._.
Some_DT analysts_NNS are_VBP especially_RB wary_JJ of_IN credit-card_NN issues_NNS ._.
For_IN one_CD thing_NN ,_, credit-card_NN loans_NNS are_VBP unsecured_JJ ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, they_PRP fear_VBP that_IN banks_NNS have_VBP been_VBN overeager_JJ to_TO issue_VB cards_NNS to_TO the_DT public_JJ --_: giving_VBG cards_NNS to_TO too_RB many_JJ big_JJ spenders_NNS who_WP will_MD default_VB during_IN a_DT recession_NN ._.
``_`` A_DT day_NN of_IN reckoning_NN is_VBZ coming_VBG where_WRB we_PRP think_VBP the_DT market_NN will_MD place_VB a_DT high_JJ premium_NN on_IN the_DT highest-quality_JJ debt_NN issues_NNS ,_, and_CC therefore_RB we_PRP think_VBP the_DT best_JJS debt_NN investment_NN is_VBZ U.S._NNP government_NN bonds_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Craig_NNP Corcoran_NNP of_IN Davis\/Zweig_NNP Futures_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, an_DT investment_NN advisory_JJ firm_NN ._.
What_WP about_IN triple-A-rated_JJ asset-backed_JJ issues_NNS ?_.

``_`` I_PRP want_VBP to_TO know_VB who_WP made_VBD the_DT decision_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD safe_JJ for_IN 186,000_CD people_NNS to_TO use_VB every_DT day_NN ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Richard_NNP Katz_NNP ,_, a_DT state_NN legislator_NN who_WP is_VBZ chairman_NN of_IN the_DT California_NNP Assembly_NNP 's_POS transportation_NN committee_NN ._.

The_DT Cypress_NNP structure_NN opened_VBD in_IN June_NNP 1957_CD ,_, and_CC as_IN such_JJ ,_, like_IN many_JJ buildings_NNS in_IN the_DT San_NNP Francisco_NNP Bay_NNP area_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB meet_VB current_JJ building_NN codes_NNS requiring_VBG considerably_RB more_JJR steel_NN support_NN ._.
The_DT northern_JJ piers_NNS of_IN the_DT span_NN lie_NN in_IN estuarian_NN deposits_NNS that_WDT were_VBD of_IN a_DT type_NN to_TO have_VB liquefied_VBN easily_RB during_IN the_DT 1906_CD quake_NN ._.
Transportation_NN department_NN officials_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, said_VBD they_PRP were_VBD as_RB surprised_VBN as_IN anyone_NN by_IN the_DT Cypress_NNP destruction_NN ._.

What_WP if_IN it_PRP happened_VBD to_TO us_PRP ?_.
In_IN the_DT wake_NN of_IN the_DT earthquake_NN in_IN California_NNP and_CC the_DT devastation_NN of_IN Hurricane_NNP Hugo_NNP ,_, many_JJ companies_NNS in_IN disaster-prone_JJ areas_NNS are_VBP pondering_VBG the_DT question_NN of_IN preparedness_NN ._.

Others_NNS say_VBP they_PRP feel_VBP confident_JJ that_IN steps_NNS they_PRP 've_VBP already_RB taken_VBN would_MD see_VB them_PRP through_IN a_DT disaster_NN ._.

Some_DT big_JJ companies_NNS have_VBP teams_NNS of_IN in-house_JJ experts_NNS focusing_VBG on_IN safety_NN and_CC business_NN resumption_NN ._.
Many_JJ companies_NNS in_IN the_DT path_NN of_IN potential_JJ disaster_NN have_VBP set_VBN up_IN contingency_NN offices_NNS in_IN safe_JJ regions_NNS ,_, hoping_VBG they_PRP can_MD transport_VB employees_NNS there_EX and_CC resume_VB operations_NNS quickly_RB ._.
That_DT means_VBZ making_VBG sure_JJ that_IN copies_NNS of_IN vital_JJ computer_NN software_NN and_CC company_NN records_NNS are_VBP out_IN of_IN harm_NN 's_POS way_NN ._.
Some_DT businesses_NNS --_: like_IN Disneyland_NNP --_: claim_NN that_IN even_RB if_IN they_PRP became_VBD isolated_VBN in_IN a_DT crisis_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO feed_VB and_CC care_NN for_IN their_PRP$ people_NNS for_IN as_RB long_RB as_IN five_CD days_NNS ._.
``_`` Self-sufficiency_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT cornerstone_NN of_IN your_PRP$ plan_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Stephanie_NNP Masaki-Schatz_NNP ,_, manager_NN of_IN corporate_JJ emergency_NN planning_NN at_IN Atlantic_NNP Richfield_NNP Co._NNP in_IN Los_NNP Angeles_NNP ._.
``_`` If_IN you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB save_VB your_PRP$ critical_JJ people_NNS ,_, you_PRP wo_MD n't_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO bring_VB up_IN your_PRP$ vital_JJ business_NN functions_NNS ._. ''_''
Although_IN ARCO_NNP 's_POS head_NN office_NN ,_, more_JJR than_IN 300_CD miles_NNS from_IN the_DT epicenter_NN ,_, was_VBD n't_RB affected_VBN by_IN this_DT week_NN 's_POS tremors_NNS ,_, Ms._NNP Masaki-Schatz_NNP used_VBD the_DT occasion_NN to_TO distribute_VB a_DT three-page_JJ memo_NN of_IN ``_`` Earthquake_NNP Tips_NNP ''_'' to_TO 1,200_CD ARCO_NNP employees_NNS ._.
``_`` You_PRP need_VBP to_TO capitalize_VB on_IN these_DT moments_NNS when_WRB you_PRP have_VBP everyone_NN 's_POS attention_NN ,_, ''_'' she_PRP says_VBZ ._.
``_`` It_PRP was_VBD a_DT good_JJ reminder_NN that_IN we_PRP all_DT need_NN to_TO prepare_VB prior_RB to_TO an_DT event_NN ._. ''_''

What_WP accounts_VBZ for_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN recent_JJ decades_NNS ?_.
A_DT simple_JJ economic_JJ theory_NN may_MD provide_VB at_IN least_JJS a_DT partial_JJ explanation_NN for_IN the_DT split_NN personality_NN displayed_VBN by_IN Americans_NNPS in_IN the_DT voting_NN booth_NN ._.

1_CD -RRB-_) Voters_NNS can_MD ``_`` buy_VB ''_'' one_CD of_IN two_CD brands_NNS when_WRB they_PRP select_VBP their_PRP$ political_JJ agents_NNS --_: a_DT Republican_NNP brand_NN that_WDT believes_VBZ in_IN the_DT minimalist_JJ state_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT virtues_NNS of_IN private_JJ markets_NNS over_IN the_DT vices_NNS of_IN public_JJ action_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT Democratic_JJ brand_NN that_WDT believes_VBZ in_IN big_JJ government_NN and_CC in_IN public_JJ intervention_NN to_TO remedy_VB the_DT excesses_NNS attendant_NN to_TO the_DT pursuit_NN of_IN private_JJ interest_NN ._.
2_CD -RRB-_) Congressional_NNP representatives_NNS have_VBP two_CD basic_JJ responsibilities_NNS while_IN voting_NN in_IN office_NN --_: dealing_VBG with_IN national_JJ issues_NNS -LRB-_( programmatic_JJ actions_NNS such_JJ as_IN casting_VBG roll_NN call_NN votes_NNS on_IN legislation_NN that_WDT imposes_VBZ costs_NNS and\/or_NN confers_VBZ benefits_NNS on_IN the_DT population_NN at_IN large_JJ -RRB-_) and_CC attending_VBG to_TO local_JJ issues_NNS -LRB-_( constituency_NN service_NN and_CC pork_NN barrel_NN -RRB-_) ._.
3_CD -RRB-_) Republican_NNP congressional_JJ representatives_NNS ,_, because_IN of_IN their_PRP$ belief_NN in_IN a_DT minimalist_JJ state_NN ,_, are_VBP less_RBR willing_JJ to_TO engage_VB in_IN local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN than_IN are_VBP Democratic_JJ members_NNS of_IN Congress_NNP ._.
If_IN these_DT assumptions_NNS hold_VBP ,_, voters_NNS in_IN races_NNS for_IN Congress_NNP face_NN what_WP in_IN economic_JJ theory_NN is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT prisoner_NN 's_POS dilemma_NN and_CC have_VBP an_DT incentive_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT margin_NN ,_, to_TO lean_VB Democratic_JJ ._.
If_IN they_PRP put_VBP a_DT Republican_NNP into_IN office_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB will_MD they_PRP acquire_VB less_JJR in_IN terms_NNS of_IN local_JJ benefits_NNS but_CC their_PRP$ selected_VBN legislator_NN will_MD be_VB relatively_RB powerless_JJ to_TO prevent_VB other_JJ legislators_NNS from_IN ``_`` bringing_VBG home_NN the_DT bacon_NN ''_'' to_TO their_PRP$ respective_JJ constituencies_NNS ._.
Each_DT legislator_NN ,_, after_IN all_DT ,_, is_VBZ only_RB one_CD out_IN of_IN 535_CD when_WRB it_PRP comes_VBZ to_TO national_JJ policy_NN making_VBG ._.
In_IN races_NNS for_IN the_DT White_NNP House_NNP ,_, a_DT voter_NN 's_POS incentive_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT margin_NN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO lean_VB Republican_NNP ._.
Although_IN a_DT GOP_NNP president_NN may_MD limit_VB local_JJ benefits_NNS to_TO the_DT voter_NN 's_POS particular_JJ district\/state_NN ,_, such_JJ a_DT president_NN is_VBZ also_RB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB more_RBR effective_JJ at_IN preventing_VBG other_JJ districts\/states_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ legislators_NNS from_IN bringing_VBG home_NN the_DT local_JJ benefits_NNS ._.
The_DT individual_JJ voter_NN 's_POS standing_VBG consequently_RB will_MD be_VB enhanced_VBN through_IN lower_JJR taxes_NNS ._.
While_IN this_DT theory_NN is_VBZ exceedingly_RB simple_JJ ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO explain_VB several_JJ things_NNS ._.
First_RB ,_, why_WRB ticket_NN splitting_NN has_VBZ increased_VBN and_CC taken_VBN the_DT peculiar_JJ pattern_NN that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ over_IN the_DT past_JJ half_NN century_NN :_: Prior_RB to_TO the_DT election_NN of_IN Franklin_NNP Roosevelt_NNP as_IN president_NN and_CC the_DT advent_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP Deal_NNP ,_, government_NN occupied_VBD a_DT much_RB smaller_JJR role_NN in_IN society_NN and_CC the_DT prisoner_NN 's_POS dilemma_NN problem_NN confronting_VBG voters_NNS in_IN races_NNS for_IN Congress_NNP was_VBD considerably_RB less_RBR severe_JJ ._.
Second_JJ ,_, it_PRP explains_VBZ why_WRB voters_NNS hold_VBP Congress_NNP in_IN disdain_NN but_CC generally_RB love_VBP their_PRP$ own_JJ congressional_JJ representatives_NNS :_: Any_DT individual_JJ legislator_NN 's_POS constituents_NNS appreciate_VBP the_DT specific_JJ benefits_NNS that_IN the_DT legislator_NN wins_VBZ for_IN them_PRP but_CC not_RB the_DT overall_JJ cost_NN associated_VBN with_IN every_DT other_JJ legislator_NN doing_VBG likewise_RB for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ constituency_NN ._.
Third_NNP ,_, the_DT theory_NN suggests_VBZ why_WRB legislators_NNS who_WP pay_VBP too_RB much_JJ attention_NN to_TO national_JJ policy_NN making_VBG relative_JJ to_TO local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN have_VBP lower_JJR security_NN in_IN office_NN ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, first-term_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT House_NNP ,_, once_RB the_DT most_RBS vulnerable_JJ of_IN incumbents_NNS ,_, have_VBP become_VBN virtually_RB immune_JJ to_TO defeat_VB ._.
The_DT one_CD exception_NN to_TO this_DT recent_JJ trend_NN was_VBD the_DT defeat_NN of_IN 13_CD of_IN the_DT 52_CD freshman_NN Republicans_NNPS brought_VBN into_IN office_NN in_IN 1980_CD by_IN the_DT Reagan_NNP revolution_NN and_CC running_VBG for_IN re-election_NN in_IN 1982_CD ._.

Fourth_NNP ,_, the_DT theory_NN indicates_VBZ why_WRB the_DT Republican_NNP Party_NNP may_MD have_VB a_DT difficult_JJ time_NN attracting_VBG viable_JJ candidates_NNS for_IN congressional_JJ office_NN ._.
Potential_JJ candidates_NNS may_MD be_VB discouraged_VBN from_IN running_VBG less_JJR by_IN the_DT congressional_JJ salary_NN than_IN by_IN the_DT prospect_NN of_IN defeat_NN at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT Democratic_JJ opponent_NN ._.
To_TO the_DT extent_NN that_IN potential_JJ Republican_NNP candidates_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ financial_JJ backers_NNS realize_VBP that_IN the_DT congressional_JJ prisoner_NN 's_POS dilemma_NN game_NN works_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ disadvantage_NN ,_, the_DT Republican_NNP Party_NNP will_MD be_VB hindered_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ attempts_NNS to_TO field_VB a_DT competitive_JJ slate_NN of_IN congressional_JJ candidates_NNS ._.
Fifth_NNP ,_, the_DT theory_NN may_MD provide_VB at_IN least_JJS a_DT partial_JJ reason_NN for_IN why_WRB ticket_NN splitting_NN has_VBZ been_VBN particularly_RB pronounced_VBN in_IN the_DT South_NNP ._.
To_TO the_DT extent_NN that_IN Democratic_JJ legislators_NNS from_IN the_DT South_NNP have_VBP held_VBN a_DT disproportionate_JJ share_NN of_IN power_NN in_IN Congress_NNP since_IN 1932_CD and_CC have_VBP been_VBN able_JJ to_TO translate_VB such_JJ clout_NN into_IN relatively_RB more_RBR local_JJ benefits_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ constituencies_NNS ,_, voters_NNS in_IN the_DT South_NNP have_VBP had_VBN an_DT especially_RB strong_JJ incentive_NN to_TO keep_VB such_JJ Democrats_NNPS in_IN office_NN ._.
Finally_RB ,_, the_DT theory_NN suggests_VBZ why_WRB Republicans_NNPS generally_RB have_VBP fared_VBN better_JJR in_IN Senate_NNP races_NNS than_IN in_IN campaigns_NNS for_IN the_DT House_NNP ._.
Since_IN local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN matters_NNS more_JJR and_CC national_JJ policy_NN making_VBG matters_NNS less_JJR in_IN the_DT lower_JJR chamber_NN of_IN Congress_NNP ,_, this_DT is_VBZ precisely_RB the_DT pattern_NN one_PRP would_MD expect_VB if_IN Republicans_NNPS are_VBP less_RBR willing_JJ to_TO engage_VB in_IN local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN than_IN their_PRP$ Democratic_JJ counterparts_NNS ._.
Is_VBZ there_EX any_DT empirical_JJ support_NN for_IN this_DT theory_NN ?_.
Three_CD pieces_NNS of_IN evidence_NN corroborate_VB the_DT key_JJ assumption_NN that_IN Democratic_JJ legislators_NNS are_VBP more_RBR willing_JJ to_TO engage_VB in_IN local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN than_IN their_PRP$ Republican_NNP colleagues_NNS ._.
First_RB ,_, economists_NNS James_NNP Bennett_NNP and_CC Thomas_NNP DiLorenzo_NNP find_VB that_IN GOP_NNP senators_NNS turn_VBP back_RB roughly_RB 10_CD %_NN more_JJR of_IN their_PRP$ allocated_VBN personal_JJ staff_NN budgets_NNS than_IN Democrats_NNPS do_VBP ._.
To_TO the_DT extent_NN that_IN the_DT primary_JJ duty_NN of_IN personal_JJ staff_NN involves_VBZ local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN ,_, this_DT indicates_VBZ that_IN political_JJ philosophy_NN leads_VBZ congressional_JJ Republicans_NNPS to_TO pay_VB less_JJR attention_NN to_TO narrow_VB constituent_NN concerns_NNS ._.
Second_JJ ,_, if_IN the_DT key_JJ assumption_NN is_VBZ valid_JJ ,_, Democrats_NNPS should_MD have_VB lower_JJR attendance_NN rates_NNS on_IN roll-call_JJ votes_NNS than_IN Republicans_NNPS do_VBP to_TO the_DT extent_NN that_IN such_JJ votes_NNS reflect_VBP national_JJ policy_NN making_VBG and_CC that_IN participating_VBG in_IN such_JJ votes_NNS takes_VBZ away_RB from_IN the_DT time_NN a_DT legislator_NN could_MD otherwise_RB devote_VB to_TO local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ indeed_RB what_WP the_DT data_NNS indicate_VBP ,_, particularly_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT House_NNP ._.
The_DT Democratic_NNP House_NNP attendance_NN rate_NN has_VBZ not_RB exceeded_VBN the_DT Republican_NNP House_NNP attendance_NN rate_NN since_IN 1959_CD ._.
Finally_RB ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT table_NN ,_, Democrats_NNPS allocate_VBP a_DT higher_JJR proportion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ personal_JJ staffs_NNS to_TO district_NN offices_NNS --_: where_WRB local_JJ benefit-seeking_NN duties_NNS matter_VBP more_JJR and_CC national_JJ policy_NN making_VBG activities_NNS matter_VBP less_RBR relative_JJ to_TO Washington_NNP offices_NNS ._.
An_DT examination_NN of_IN changes_NNS in_IN personal_JJ staffing_NN decisions_NNS in_IN the_DT Senate_NNP between_IN 1986_CD and_CC 1987_CD -LRB-_( when_WRB control_NN of_IN that_DT body_NN changed_VBD party_NN hands_NNS -RRB-_) ,_, moreover_RB ,_, reveals_VBZ that_IN the_DT personal_JJ staffing_NN differences_NNS noted_VBD in_IN the_DT table_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB attributed_VBN to_TO the_DT disproportionate_JJ control_NN Democrats_NNPS exercise_NN ,_, due_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ majority-party_JJ status_NN ,_, over_IN other_JJ resources_NNS such_JJ as_IN committee_NN staff_NN ._.
An_DT additional_JJ piece_NN of_IN evidence_NN from_IN the_DT Senate_NNP :_: Holding_NNP other_JJ factors_NNS constant_JJ ,_, such_JJ as_IN incumbency_NN advantages_NNS and_CC regional_JJ factors_NNS ,_, the_DT difference_NN between_IN popular_JJ votes_NNS for_IN Republican_NNP presidential_JJ and_CC senatorial_JJ candidates_NNS in_IN states_NNS conducting_VBG a_DT Senate_NNP election_NN turns_VBZ out_IN to_TO be_VB a_DT positive_JJ function_NN of_IN how_WRB onerous_JJ the_DT federal_JJ government_NN 's_POS tax_NN burden_NN is_VBZ per_IN state_NN -LRB-_( a_DT progressive_JJ tax_NN rate_NN hits_VBZ higher-income_JJ states_NNS harder_JJR -RRB-_) ._.
Put_VB more_RBR simply_RB ,_, GOP_NNP candidates_NNS for_IN president_NN are_VBP looked_VBN on_IN more_RBR kindly_RB by_IN voters_NNS than_IN Republican_NNP candidates_NNS for_IN the_DT Senate_NNP when_WRB the_DT prisoner_NN 's_POS dilemma_NN is_VBZ more_RBR severe_JJ ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, ticket_NN splitting_NN appears_VBZ to_TO take_VB the_DT same_JJ peculiar_JJ pattern_NN at_IN the_DT state_NN government_NN level_NN as_IN it_PRP does_VBZ at_IN the_DT federal_JJ level_NN ._.

Mr._NNP Semel_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ firm_NN ,_, Semel_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, have_VBP appealed_VBN the_DT Comex_NNP decision_NN and_CC the_DT sanctions_NNS to_TO the_DT Commodity_NNP Futures_NNS Trading_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
