The_DT pillars_NNS of_IN apartheid_NN may_MD be_VB trembling_VBG in_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, with_IN Johannesburg_NNP opening_VBG its_PRP$ public_JJ facilities_NNS to_TO all_DT races_NNS ,_, blacks_NNS storming_VBG the_DT all-white_JJ beaches_NNS of_IN the_DT Cape_NNP and_CC the_DT government_NN releasing_VBG seven_CD leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT banned_VBN African_NNP National_NNP Congress_NNP ._.
But_CC here_RB in_IN Morgenzon_NNP ,_, a_DT sleepy_JJ town_NN amid_IN the_DT corn_NN fields_NNS of_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Transvaal_NNP ,_, the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS are_VBP holding_VBG the_DT pillars_NNS steady_JJ ._.
The_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS --_: who_WP take_VBP their_PRP$ name_NN from_IN William_NNP of_IN Orange_NNP of_IN the_DT Netherlands_NNP ,_, a_DT hero_NN of_IN the_DT Dutch-descended_JJ Afrikaners_NNPS --_: believe_VBP that_IN the_DT solution_NN to_TO South_NNP Africa_NNP 's_POS racial_JJ problems_NNS is_VBZ n't_RB the_DT abolition_NN of_IN apartheid_NN ,_, it_PRP 's_VBZ the_DT perfection_NN of_IN apartheid_NN --_: complete_JJ and_CC total_JJ separation_NN of_IN the_DT races_NNS ._.
Here_RB ,_, then_RB ,_, is_VBZ where_WRB the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS have_VBP come_VBN to_TO make_VB apartheid_NN 's_POS last_JJ stand_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ idea_NN is_VBZ to_TO create_VB a_DT city_NN ,_, first_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB an_DT entire_JJ nation_NN --_: without_IN blacks_NNS ._.
This_DT may_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB a_DT preposterous_JJ and_CC utterly_RB futile_JJ effort_NN in_IN Africa_NNP ._.
And_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX are_VBP only_RB 3,000_CD card-carrying_JJ Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS may_MD put_VB them_PRP on_IN the_DT loony_JJ fringe_NN ._.
But_CC their_PRP$ ideal_NN of_IN an_DT Afrikaner_JJ homeland_NN ,_, an_DT all-white_JJ reserve_NN to_TO be_VB carved_VBN out_IN of_IN present-day_JJ South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, is_VBZ a_DT mainstream_NN desire_NN of_IN the_DT right-wing_NN ,_, which_WDT embraces_VBZ about_IN one-third_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN 's_POS five_CD million_CD whites_NNS ._.
Afrikaner_JJ philosophers_NNS and_CC theologians_NNS have_VBP long_RB ruminated_VBN on_IN the_DT need_NN for_IN a_DT white_JJ homeland_NN ._.
The_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS are_VBP just_RB putting_VBG this_DT preaching_NN into_IN practice_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, farmer_NN Johan_NNP Fischer_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ T-shirt_NN and_CC jeans_NNS covered_VBN in_IN grease_NN ,_, crawls_VBZ around_IN under_IN his_PRP$ planter_NN ,_, tightening_VBG bolts_NNS and_CC fixing_VBG dents_NNS ._.
On_IN almost_RB every_DT other_JJ farm_NN in_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ,_, black_JJ workers_NNS do_VBP the_DT repairs_NNS ._.
But_CC not_RB here_RB ._.
Mr._NNP Fischer_NNP plows_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ fields_NNS ,_, sows_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ corn_NN and_CC sunflowers_NNS ,_, and_CC feeds_VBZ his_PRP$ own_JJ sheep_NN ._.
Over_IN at_IN the_DT fiberglass_NNS factory_NN ,_, four_CD white_JJ workers_NNS assemble_VBP water_NN tanks_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN their_PRP$ spare_JJ time_NN they_PRP build_VBP townhouses_NNS across_IN the_DT road_NN ._.
On_IN Main_NNP Street_NNP ,_, Alida_NNP Verwoerd_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ daughters_NNS look_VBP after_IN the_DT clothes_NNS and_CC fabric_NN shop_NN ,_, then_JJ hurry_NN home_NN to_TO fix_VB lunch_NN for_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN ._.
Down_IN by_IN the_DT stream_NN ,_, a_DT group_NN of_IN Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS puts_VBZ the_DT finishing_VBG touches_NNS on_IN a_DT golf_NN course_NN ._.
If_IN whites_NNS want_VBP to_TO play_VB there_RB by_IN themselves_PRP ,_, says_VBZ consulting_NN engineer_NN Willem_NNP van_NNP Heerden_NNP ,_, whites_NNS should_MD also_RB build_VB it_PRP by_IN themselves_PRP ._.
``_`` If_IN we_PRP want_VBP to_TO survive_VB as_IN a_DT people_NNS ,_, ''_'' he_PRP says_VBZ ,_, ``_`` we_PRP have_VBP to_TO change_VB our_PRP$ way_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
The_DT Afrikaner_JJ must_MD end_VB his_PRP$ reliance_NN on_IN others_NNS ._. ''_''
In_IN their_PRP$ quest_NN to_TO perfect_JJ apartheid_NN ,_, the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS have_VBP discovered_VBN a_DT truth_NN that_IN most_RBS of_IN privileged_JJ white_JJ South_NNP Africa_NNP tries_VBZ mightily_RB to_TO deny_VB :_: The_DT master_NN ca_MD n't_RB become_VB dependent_JJ on_IN the_DT slave_NN and_CC expect_VBP to_TO remain_VB master_NN forever_RB ._.
``_`` If_IN apartheid_NN means_VBZ you_PRP want_VBP cheap_JJ black_JJ labor_NN and_CC all_PDT the_DT comforts_NNS that_WDT go_VBP with_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC you_PRP also_RB want_VBP to_TO exclude_VB the_DT blacks_NNS from_IN social_JJ and_CC political_JJ integration_NN ,_, then_RB these_DT are_VBP two_CD contradictions_NNS that_WDT ca_MD n't_RB go_VB on_IN forever_RB ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Verwoerd_NNP ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ sitting_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ living_NN room_NN ,_, beneath_IN a_DT huge_JJ portrait_NN of_IN his_PRP$ late_JJ father_NN ,_, Hendrik_NNP F._NNP Verwoerd_NNP ,_, apartheid_NN 's_POS architect_NN and_CC South_JJ African_JJ prime_JJ minister_NN from_IN 1958_CD to_TO 1966_CD ._.
Somewhere_RB ,_, the_DT son_NN sighs_VBZ ,_, things_NNS went_VBN terribly_RB wrong_JJ with_IN apartheid_NN ;_: today_NN ,_, whites_NNS even_RB rely_VBP on_IN blacks_NNS to_TO police_VB their_PRP$ separation_NN ._.

The_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS speak_VBP sincerely_RB ._.
``_`` We_PRP agree_VBP with_IN world_NN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT status_NN quo_FW in_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP is_VBZ morally_RB wrong_JJ ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Pieter_NNP Bruwer_NNP ,_, the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS '_POS chief_JJ scribe_NN and_CC pamphleteer_NN ._.

Morgenzon_NNP has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN a_DT special_JJ domain_NN of_IN Afrikanerdom_NNP ._.
According_VBG to_TO Mr._NNP Verwoerd_NNP ,_, the_DT early_JJ Afrikaner_JJ pioneers_NNS were_VBD the_DT first_JJ people_NNS to_TO settle_VB in_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Transvaal_NNP ,_, even_RB before_IN the_DT blacks_NNS ._.
Then_RB ,_, when_WRB Morgenzon_NNP was_VBD incorporated_VBN in_IN 1908_CD ,_, the_DT farmer_NN who_WP owned_VBD the_DT land_NN stipulated_VBD that_IN only_JJ whites_NNS could_MD reside_VB in_IN town_NN ;_: blacks_NNS could_MD work_VB there_EX ,_, but_CC they_PRP had_VBD to_TO leave_VB at_IN night_NN ._.
Today_NN ,_, Morgenzon_NNP is_VBZ a_DT town_NN of_IN 800_CD whites_NNS and_CC two_CD paved_JJ roads_NNS ._.
Weeds_NNS push_VBP up_IN through_IN the_DT cracks_NNS in_IN the_DT sidewalks_NNS ,_, and_CC many_JJ houses_NNS and_CC storefronts_NNS are_VBP empty_JJ ._.
There_EX are_VBP few_JJ factories_NNS and_CC no_DT mines_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD an_DT ideal_JJ place_NN for_IN the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS to_TO start_VB their_PRP$ new_JJ nation_NN ,_, unencumbered_JJ by_IN the_DT demographics_NNS that_WDT have_VBP undermined_VBN apartheid_NN elsewhere_RB in_IN South_NNP Africa_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB ,_, about_IN 150_CD Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS have_VBP moved_VBN here_RB ,_, spending_NN nearly_RB $_$ 1_CD million_CD buying_VBG up_IN property_NN over_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
Still_RB ,_, complete_JJ and_CC total_JJ segregation_NN remains_VBZ elusive_JJ ._.
Just_RB beyond_IN the_DT city_NN limits_NNS is_VBZ a_DT shantytown_NN of_IN 2,000_CD blacks_NNS who_WP are_VBP employed_VBN throughout_IN the_DT area_NN ._.
Despite_IN the_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS '_POS intention_NN to_TO put_VB them_PRP all_DT out_NN of_IN work_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP in_IN no_DT hurry_NN to_TO leave_VB ._.

GET_VB RID_VB OF_IN THE_DT DOGS_NNS ._.

The_DT companies_NNS apt_JJ to_TO run_VB into_IN earnings_NNS problems_NNS soonest_JJS are_VBP the_DT ones_NNS with_IN heavy_JJ debt_NN loads_NNS ,_, says_VBZ Larry_NNP Biehl_NNP ,_, partner_NN in_IN the_DT San_NNP Mateo_NNP ,_, Calif._NNP ,_, money-management_NN firm_NN of_IN Bailard_NNP ,_, Biehl_NNP &_CC Kaiser_NNP ._.

SELL_VB `_`` WHISPER_NN '_'' STOCKS_NNS ._.
UAL_NNP Corp._NNP 's_POS difficulty_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG bank_NN financing_NN for_IN its_PRP$ leveraged_JJ buy-out_NN and_CC its_PRP$ resulting_VBG price_NN plunge_NN is_VBZ a_DT tip-off_NN to_TO what_WP 's_VBZ going_VBG to_TO happen_VB to_TO ``_`` takeover_NN stocks_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP Canelo_NNP ._.

``_`` There_EX 'll_MD be_VB fewer_JJR and_CC fewer_JJR deals_NNS ._. ''_''

Mr._NNP Canelo_NNP suggests_VBZ that_IN investors_NNS compare_VBP price\/earnings_NNS ratios_NNS -LRB-_( the_DT price_NN of_IN a_DT share_NN of_IN stock_NN divided_VBN by_IN a_DT company_NN 's_POS per-share_JJ earnings_NNS for_IN a_DT 12-month_JJ period_NN -RRB-_) with_IN projected_VBN growth_NN rates_NNS ._.

Mr._NNP Canelo_NNP thinks_VBZ the_DT market_NN will_MD probably_RB go_VB higher_JJR ,_, but_CC ``_`` will_MD be_VB ruthless_JJ with_IN stocks_NNS if_IN the_DT earnings_NNS are_VBP n't_RB there_RB ._. ''_''
Mr._NNP Markese_NNP cautions_VBZ that_IN investors_NNS should_MD n't_RB slavishly_RB follow_VB any_DT specific_JJ price\/earnings_NNS sell_VBP trigger_VB ._.

DAF_NNP is_VBZ 16%-owned_JJ by_IN British_NNP Aerospace_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT further_JJ 6.5_CD %_NN held_VBN by_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ state-owned_JJ chemical_NN group_NN NV_NNP DSM_NNP ._.
The_DT van_NNP Doorne_NNP family_NN of_IN the_DT Netherlands_NNP holds_VBZ an_DT additional_JJ 11_CD %_NN of_IN DAF_NNP 's_POS capital_NN ._.
The_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP System_NNP is_VBZ the_DT standard_JJ object_NN of_IN suggestions_NNS for_IN organizational_JJ and_CC institutional_JJ changes_NNS ,_, for_IN two_CD reasons_NNS ._.
First_RB ,_, its_PRP$ position_NN in_IN the_DT government_NN is_VBZ anomalous_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ an_DT unusual_JJ kind_NN of_IN independence_NN from_IN elected_VBN officials_NNS and_CC still_RB has_VBZ authority_NN over_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS powerful_JJ of_IN government_NN 's_POS instruments_NNS --_: the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT money_NN supply_NN ._.
Thus_RB we_PRP have_VBP a_DT condition_NN that_WDT is_VBZ easily_RB described_VBN as_IN undemocratic_JJ ._.
Second_JJ ,_, the_DT responsibilities_NNS of_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP as_IN guardian_NN of_IN the_DT currency_NN ,_, which_WDT means_VBZ as_IN guardian_NN of_IN the_DT stability_NN of_IN the_DT price_NN level_NN ,_, sometimes_RB lead_VB it_PRP to_TO take_VB measures_NNS that_WDT are_VBP unpopular_JJ ._.
As_IN former_JJ Fed_NNP Chairman_NNP William_NNP McChesney_NNP Martin_NNP used_VBD to_TO say_VB ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO take_VB the_DT punch_NN bowl_NN away_RB just_RB as_IN the_DT party_NN is_VBZ getting_VBG interesting_JJ ._.
So_RB the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP is_VBZ an_DT attractive_JJ target_NN for_IN complaint_NN by_IN politicians_NNS ._.
The_DT Fed_NNP is_VBZ easily_RB assigned_VBN the_DT blame_NN for_IN unpleasantness_NN ,_, like_IN high_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS or_CC slow_JJ economic_JJ growth_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT politicians_NNS can_MD escape_VB responsibility_NN by_IN pointing_VBG to_TO the_DT Fed_NNP 's_POS independence_NN ._.
This_DT leads_VBZ to_TO proposals_NNS for_IN ``_`` reform_NN ''_'' of_IN the_DT Fed_NNP ,_, which_WDT have_VBP the_DT common_JJ feature_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT Fed_NNP more_RBR responsive_JJ to_TO the_DT administration_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT Congress_NNP and_CC to_TO public_JJ opinion_NN --_: without_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, any_DT assumption_NN of_IN additional_JJ responsibility_NN by_IN the_DT politicians_NNS ._.
These_DT proposals_NNS include_VBP changing_VBG the_DT term_NN of_IN the_DT chairman_NN ,_, shortening_VBG the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT members_NNS ,_, eliminating_VBG the_DT presidents_NNS of_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP Banks_NNP from_IN the_DT decision-making_NN process_NN ,_, putting_VBG the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Treasury_NNP on_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP Board_NNP ,_, having_VBG the_DT Fed_NNP audited_VBN by_IN an_DT arm_NN of_IN Congress_NNP -LRB-_( the_DT General_NNP Accounting_NNP Office_NNP -RRB-_) ,_, putting_VBG the_DT Fed_NNP 's_POS expenditures_NNS in_IN the_DT budget_NN ,_, and_CC requiring_VBG prompt_VB publication_NN of_IN the_DT Fed_NNP 's_POS minutes_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT ideas_NNS are_VBP again_RB under_IN consideration_NN in_IN Congress_NNP ._.
But_CC these_DT proposals_NNS do_VBP not_RB rest_VB on_IN a_DT view_NN of_IN what_WP the_DT Fed_NNP 's_POS problem_NN is_VBZ or_CC ,_, if_IN they_PRP do_VBP ,_, they_PRP rest_VBP on_IN an_DT incorrect_JJ view_NN ._.
They_PRP would_MD not_RB solve_VB the_DT problem_NN ;_: they_PRP would_MD make_VB it_PRP worse_JJR ._.
The_DT problem_NN is_VBZ not_RB that_IN the_DT Fed_NNP is_VBZ too_RB unresponsive_JJ to_TO the_DT public_JJ interest_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ too_RB responsive_JJ to_TO an_DT incorrect_JJ view_NN of_IN the_DT public_JJ interest_NN ._.
The_DT price_NN level_NN in_IN the_DT U.S._NNP is_VBZ now_RB about_IN 4_CD 1\/4_CD times_NNS as_RB high_JJ as_IN it_PRP was_VBD 30_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
On_IN average_JJ ,_, something_NN that_DT cost_NN $_$ 100_CD 30_CD years_NNS ago_RB now_RB costs_VBZ $_$ 425_CD ._.
Or_CC ,_, a_DT wage_NN that_WDT was_VBD $_$ 100_CD 30_CD years_NNS ago_RB would_MD buy_VB only_RB $_$ 23.53_CD worth_NN of_IN stuff_NN today_NN ._.
On_IN two_CD occasions_VBZ the_DT inflation_NN rate_NN rose_VBD to_TO more_JJR than_IN 10_CD %_NN a_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN each_DT case_NN the_DT ending_NN of_IN this_DT unsustainable_JJ inflation_NN caused_VBD a_DT severe_JJ recession_NN --_: the_DT two_CD worst_JJS of_IN the_DT postwar_JJ period_NN ._.
The_DT enormous_JJ inflation_NN over_IN the_DT past_JJ 30_CD years_NNS was_VBD largely_RB due_JJ to_TO monetary_JJ policy_NN ._.
At_IN least_JJS ,_, it_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB happened_VBN without_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN monetary_JJ policy_NN that_WDT provided_VBD for_IN a_DT 10-fold_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT money_NN supply_NN during_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN ._.
And_CC that_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT money_NN supply_NN would_MD not_RB have_VB happened_VBN without_IN the_DT consent_NN of_IN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP ._.
The_DT basic_JJ problem_NN of_IN monetary_JJ policy_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT reform_NN of_IN the_DT Fed_NNP should_MD be_VB addressed_VBN ,_, is_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB a_DT recurrence_NN of_IN this_DT experience_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD two_CD general_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN the_DT mistaken_VBN monetary_JJ policy_NN of_IN the_DT past_JJ 30_CD years_NNS :_:
1_CD ._. To_TO some_DT extent_NN the_DT Federal_NNP Reserve_NNP shared_VBD the_DT popular_JJ but_CC incorrect_JJ view_NN that_IN expansionary_JJ monetary_JJ policy_NN could_MD yield_VB a_DT net_JJ improvement_NN in_IN employment_NN and_CC output_NN ._.
2_CD ._. Even_RB where_WRB the_DT Fed_NNP did_VBD not_RB share_VB this_DT view_NN it_PRP felt_VBD the_DT need_NN to_TO accommodate_VB to_TO it_PRP ._.
Despite_IN all_PDT the_DT formal_JJ provisions_NNS for_IN its_PRP$ independence_NN ,_, the_DT Fed_NNP seems_VBZ constantly_RB to_TO feel_VB that_IN if_IN it_PRP uses_VBZ its_PRP$ independence_NN too_RB freely_RB it_PRP will_MD lose_VB it_PRP ._.

Also_RB ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB been_VBN decided_VBN exactly_RB how_WRB much_NN of_IN the_DT mortgage_NN AEW_NNP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO convert_VB into_IN equity_NN ._.
Convertible_JJ mortgages_NNS have_VBP become_VBN an_DT increasingly_RB popular_JJ way_NN to_TO finance_VB prestigious_JJ buildings_NNS of_IN late_JJ ._.
In_IN a_DT convertible_JJ mortgage_NN ,_, the_DT investor_NN lends_VBZ the_DT building_NN owner_NN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN in_IN return_NN for_IN the_DT option_NN to_TO convert_VB its_PRP$ interest_NN into_IN equity_NN ,_, usually_RB less_JJR than_IN 50_CD %_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT loan_NN term_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT term_NN ,_, the_DT lender_NN can_MD either_DT receive_VB a_DT percentage_NN of_IN cash_NN flow_NN ,_, a_DT percentage_NN of_IN the_DT building_NN 's_POS appreciation_NN or_CC a_DT fixed_VBN return_NN ._.
The_DT main_JJ advantage_NN of_IN a_DT convertible_JJ mortgage_NN is_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT sale_NN and_CC therefore_RB does_VBZ not_RB trigger_VB costly_JJ transfer_NN taxes_NNS and_CC reappraisal_NN ._.
Sears_NNP said_VBD it_PRP would_MD put_VB the_DT 110-story_JJ tower_NN on_IN the_DT block_NN almost_RB a_DT year_NN ago_RB as_IN part_NN of_IN its_PRP$ anti-takeover_JJ restructuring_NN ._.

But_CC that_DT deal_NN fell_VBD through_IN in_IN September_NNP after_IN it_PRP became_VBD clear_JJ that_IN the_DT sale_NN would_MD lead_VB to_TO a_DT major_JJ real_JJ estate_NN tax_NN reassessment_NN ,_, raising_VBG property_NN taxes_NNS ,_, and_CC making_VBG it_PRP difficult_JJ to_TO lease_VB the_DT building_NN at_IN competitive_JJ prices_NNS ._.

AEW_NNP has_VBZ $_$ 3.5_CD billion_CD of_IN real_JJ estate_NN investments_NNS nationwide_JJ ,_, according_VBG to_TO a_DT spokesman_NN ._.

The_DT transaction_NN will_MD give_VB Tandy_NNP a_DT well-known_JJ European_JJ computer_NN brand_NN that_WDT includes_VBZ 2,700_CD dealers_NNS and_CC distributors_NNS marketing_NN to_TO medium-sized_JJ business_NN and_CC educational_JJ institutions_NNS ._.
Closing_NN of_IN the_DT transaction_NN is_VBZ subject_NN to_TO certain_JJ conditions_NNS and_CC regulatory_JJ approvals_NNS ,_, the_DT company_NN said_VBD ._.
Two_CD rules_NNS in_IN pending_VBG congressional_JJ legislation_NN threaten_VB to_TO hinder_VB leveraged_JJ buy-outs_NNS by_IN raising_VBG the_DT price_NN tags_NNS of_IN such_JJ deals_NNS by_IN as_RB much_JJ as_IN 10_CD %_NN ._.
Wall_NNP Street_NNP is_VBZ seething_VBG over_IN the_DT rules_NNS ,_, which_WDT would_MD curtail_VB the_DT tax_NN deductibility_NN of_IN debt_NN used_VBN in_IN most_RBS LBOs_NNS ._.
The_DT provisions_NNS ,_, in_IN deficit-reduction_NN bills_NNS recently_RB passed_VBN by_IN the_DT House_NNP and_CC Senate_NNP ,_, could_MD further_VB cool_VB the_DT takeover_NN boom_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT driving_VBG force_NN behind_IN the_DT bull_NN market_NN in_IN stocks_NNS for_IN much_NN of_IN the_DT 1980s_CD ,_, some_DT tax_NN experts_NNS and_CC investment_NN bankers_NNS argue_VBP ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, some_DT investment_NN bankers_NNS have_VBP already_RB started_VBN restructuring_NN deals_NNS to_TO cope_VB with_IN the_DT expected_VBN rules_NNS ._.
Wall_NNP Street_NNP has_VBZ all_DT but_CC conceded_VBN on_IN the_DT issue_NN and_CC is_VBZ now_RB lobbying_VBG for_IN the_DT less_RBR onerous_JJ Senate_NNP version_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT provisions_NNS ._.
At_IN issue_NN is_VBZ the_DT deductibility_NN of_IN certain_JJ junk_NN bonds_NNS that_WDT are_VBP used_VBN in_IN most_RBS LBOs_NNS ._.
Such_JJ high-yield_JJ debt_NN is_VBZ similar_JJ to_TO a_DT zero-coupon_JJ bond_NN in_IN that_DT it_PRP is_VBZ sold_VBN at_IN a_DT discount_NN to_TO face_VB value_NN ,_, with_IN interest_NN accruing_VBG instead_RB of_IN being_VBG paid_VBN to_TO the_DT holder_NN ._.
Under_IN current_JJ rules_NNS ,_, that_IN accrued_VBN interest_NN is_VBZ deductible_JJ by_IN the_DT company_NN issuing_VBG the_DT debt_NN ._.
The_DT House_NNP version_NN of_IN the_DT legislation_NN would_MD kill_VB that_DT deduction_NN ,_, and_CC label_VB any_DT such_JJ debt_NN as_IN equity_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ n't_RB deductible_JJ ._.
The_DT less-rigorous_JJR Senate_NNP version_NN would_MD defer_VB the_DT deductibility_NN for_IN roughly_RB five_CD years_NNS ._.
``_`` You_PRP see_VBP these_DT in_NN just_RB about_IN every_DT LBO_NNP ,_, ''_'' said_VBD Robert_NNP Willens_NNP ,_, senior_JJ vice_NN president_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN tax_NN issues_NNS at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
``_`` It_PRP becomes_VBZ a_DT source_NN of_IN cash_NN ''_'' for_IN the_DT company_NN making_VBG the_DT LBO_NNP because_IN it_PRP gets_VBZ a_DT deduction_NN and_CC does_VBZ n't_RB have_VB to_TO repay_VB the_DT debt_NN for_IN several_JJ years_NNS ._.
Typically_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Willens_NNP estimates_VBZ ,_, this_DT type_NN of_IN debt_NN makes_VBZ up_IN 15_CD %_NN to_TO 20_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT financing_NN for_IN LBOs_NNS ._.
These_DT types_NNS of_IN bonds_NNS have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN in_IN buy-outs_NNS of_IN companies_NNS such_JJ as_IN RJR_NNP Nabisco_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, Storer_NNP Communications_NNP Inc._NNP and_CC Kroger_NNP Co_NNP ._.
A_DT second_JJ provision_NN passed_VBN by_IN the_DT Senate_NNP and_CC House_NNP would_MD eliminate_VB a_DT rule_NN allowing_VBG companies_NNS that_IN post_NN losses_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN LBO_NNP debt_NN to_TO receive_VB refunds_NNS of_IN taxes_NNS paid_VBN over_IN the_DT previous_JJ three_CD years_NNS ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN a_DT company_NN posted_VBD a_DT loss_NN of_IN $_$ 100_CD million_CD from_IN buy-out_NN interest_NN payments_NNS ,_, the_DT existing_VBG rule_NN would_MD allow_VB the_DT concern_NN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO receive_VB a_DT refund_NN from_IN the_DT tax_NN it_PRP paid_VBD from_IN 1986_CD through_IN 1989_CD ,_, when_WRB it_PRP may_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT profitable_JJ public_JJ company_NN ._.
But_CC that_DT rule_NN is_VBZ being_VBG virtually_RB overlooked_VBN by_IN Wall_NNP Street_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ concentrating_VBG on_IN coping_VBG with_IN the_DT deduction_NN issue_NN ._.
``_`` Prices_NNS for_IN LBOs_NNS have_VBP to_TO come_VB down_RB if_IN you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB have_VB that_DT feature_NN ,_, ''_'' argued_VBD Lawrence_NNP Schloss_NNP ,_, managing_VBG director_NN for_IN merchant_NN banking_NN at_IN Donaldson_NNP ,_, Lufkin_NNP &_CC Jenrette_NNP Securities_NNP Corp._NNP in_IN New_NNP York_NNP ._.
Several_NNP Wall_NNP Street_NNP officials_NNS say_VBP the_DT proposed_VBN legislation_NN already_RB is_VBZ having_VBG an_DT impact_NN ._.
An_DT investment_NN group_NN led_VBN by_IN Chicago_NNP 's_POS Pritzker_NNP family_NN recently_RB lowered_VBD a_DT $_$ 3.35_CD billion_CD bid_NN for_IN American_NNP Medical_NNP International_NNP ,_, Beverly_NNP Hills_NNP ,_, Calif._NNP ,_, because_IN of_IN the_DT threat_NN of_IN the_DT legislation_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, one_CD investment_NN banker_NN ,_, who_WP requested_VBD anonymity_NN ,_, said_VBD his_PRP$ firm_NN did_VBD n't_RB raise_VB the_DT ante_NN for_IN a_DT target_NN company_NN earlier_RBR this_DT month_NN after_IN a_DT stronger_JJR bid_NN emerged_VBD from_IN a_DT public_JJ company_NN that_WDT was_VBD n't_RB concerned_VBN about_IN the_DT financing_NN provision_NN ._.
``_`` We_PRP would_MD have_VB paid_VBN more_JJR if_IN we_PRP thought_VBD that_DT law_NN was_VBD n't_RB going_VBG to_TO pass_VB ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.
One_CD possible_JJ solution_NN for_IN Wall_NNP Street_NNP is_VBZ to_TO increase_VB the_DT equity_NN part_NN of_IN the_DT transaction_NN --_: that_DT is_VBZ ,_, give_VB lenders_NNS a_DT bigger_JJR stake_NN in_IN the_DT surviving_VBG company_NN rather_RB than_IN just_RB interest_NN payments_NNS ._.

Certainly_RB conservative_JJ environmentalists_NNS can_MD defend_VB their_PRP$ limited_JJ government_NN position_NN by_IN differentiating_VBG between_IN Old_NNP Environmentalism_NNP and_CC New_NNP Environmentalism_NNP -LRB-_( ``_`` Journalists_NNS and_CC Others_NNS for_IN Saving_VBG the_DT Planet_NNP ,_, ''_'' by_IN David_NNP Brooks_NNP ,_, editorial_NN page_NN ,_, Oct._NNP 5_NN -RRB-_) ._.
Old_NNP Environmentalism_NNP involved_VBD microbe_NN hunters_NNS and_CC sanitationists_NNS ._.
It_PRP started_VBD with_IN improvements_NNS in_IN hygiene_NN made_VBD possible_JJ by_IN affordable_JJ soap_NN and_CC washable_JJ underwear_NN during_IN the_DT Industrial_NNP Revolution_NNP ._.
Then_RB cast-iron_NN sewer_NN pipe_NN and_CC the_DT flush_JJ toilet_NN were_VBD followed_VBN by_IN sewage_NN -_: and_CC water-treatment_NN plants_NNS toward_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT 19th_JJ century_NN ._.
Medicine_NNP in_IN the_DT 19th_JJ century_NN was_VBD dedicated_VBN mostly_RB to_TO combating_VBG sepsis_NN and_CC diagnostic_JJ analysis_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT 20th_JJ century_NN saw_VBD the_DT evolution_NN of_IN private-sector_JJ wonder_NN drugs_NNS ,_, which_WDT promulgated_VBD medical_JJ therapy_NN ._.
The_DT process_NN dramatically_RB increased_VBD our_PRP$ average_JJ life_NN expectancy_NN ,_, eliminated_VBN much_JJ pain_NN and_CC constantly_RB improved_VBN health_NN and_CC well-being_NN ._.
Most_JJS public-health_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD handled_VBN at_IN the_DT local_JJ level_NN ._.
New_NNP Environmentalism_NNP probably_RB started_VBD in_IN 1962_CD with_IN the_DT publication_NN of_IN Rachel_NNP Carson_NNP 's_POS book_NN ``_`` Silent_NNP Spring_NNP ._. ''_''
Shortly_RB thereafter_RB ,_, hysterical_JJ articles_NNS began_VBD to_TO appear_VB predicting_VBG that_WDT advanced_VBD industrial_JJ societies_NNS would_MD produce_VB a_DT blackened_VBN ,_, uninhabitable_JJ planet_NN possibly_RB by_IN the_DT turn_NN of_IN the_DT century_NN ._.
These_DT apocalyptic_JJ predictions_NNS were_VBD advanced_VBN by_IN such_JJ stalwarts_NNS as_IN Paul_NNP Ehrlich_NNP ,_, Barry_NNP Commoner_NNP ,_, Rene_NNP Dubois_NNP and_CC George_NNP Wald_NNP ._.
Writing_VBG in_IN the_DT 1960s_CD Ms._NNP Carson_NNP suggested_VBD that_IN the_DT human_JJ race_NN could_MD be_VB eliminated_VBN in_IN 20_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Wald_NNP suggested_VBD that_DT life_NN on_IN earth_NN might_MD end_VB by_IN 1985_CD ._.
Mr._NNP Ehrlich_NNP predicted_VBD unprecedented_JJ famine_NN by_IN 1980_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD many_RB more_JJR ._.

That_DT 's_VBZ not_RB fair_JJ ;_: they_PRP 're_VBP not_RB all_DT fat_NN ._.
HUGO'S_NNP BLAST_NN generates_VBZ pleas_NNS for_IN aid_NN from_IN South_NNP Carolina_NNP small_JJ businesses_NNS ._.
The_DT Small_NNP Business_NNP Administration_NNP has_VBZ received_VBN more_JJR than_IN 5,000_CD formal_JJ requests_NNS for_IN disaster_NN loans_NNS because_IN of_IN the_DT hurricane_NN ._.
About_IN 45_CD %_NN of_IN requests_NNS for_IN SBA_NNP relief_NN loans_NNS ,_, which_WDT also_RB are_VBP available_JJ to_TO homeowners_NNS ,_, come_VB from_IN small_JJ businesses_NNS ,_, compared_VBN with_IN a_DT 25_CD %_NN business_NN share_NN after_IN most_RBS disasters_NNS ._.
The_DT SBA_NNP expects_VBZ to_TO make_VB about_RB $_$ 1_CD billion_CD in_IN Hurricane_NNP Hugo_NNP loans_NNS ._.
The_DT disaster_NN fund_NN is_VBZ replenished_VBN by_IN loan_NN repayments_NNS ._.
Hardest_RBS hit_VBN by_IN Hugo_NNP in_IN South_NNP Carolina_NNP were_VBD small_JJ retailers_NNS tied_VBN to_TO the_DT tourist_NN industry_NN and_CC businesses_NNS in_IN agriculture_NN and_CC cultivated_VBN seafood_NN ._.
The_DT State_NNP Development_NNP Board_NNP set_VBD up_IN a_DT Hugo_NNP Hotline_NNP to_TO accept_VB business-to-business_JJ help_NN ._.

A_DT classic_JJ example_NN of_IN institutions_NNS '_POS hunger_NN for_IN liquidity_NN is_VBZ portfolio_NN insurance_NN ,_, now_RB widely_RB discredited_VBN ._.
Before_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ,_, an_DT estimated_VBN $_$ 60_CD billion_CD in_IN institutional_JJ money_NN was_VBD managed_VBN under_IN this_DT hedging_VBG technique_NN ._.
The_DT idea_NN was_VBD to_TO ``_`` insure_VB ''_'' the_DT value_NN of_IN a_DT portfolio_NN by_IN selling_VBG futures_NNS when_WRB stock_NN prices_NNS dropped_VBD --_: eliminating_VBG the_DT need_NN to_TO sell_VB the_DT stocks_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
But_CC in_IN October_NNP 1987_CD ,_, when_WRB portfolio_NN insurers_NNS rushed_VBD to_TO sell_VB at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, they_PRP overwhelmed_VBD both_DT the_DT stock_NN and_CC futures_NNS markets_NNS ._.

''_''
Some_DT experts_NNS say_VBP markets_NNS are_VBP n't_RB as_RB volatile_JJ as_IN widely_RB assumed_VBN ._.
Hans_NNP Stoll_NNP ,_, finance_NN professor_NN at_IN Vanderbilt_NNP University_NNP ,_, says_VBZ the_DT current_JJ volatility_NN in_IN U.S._NNP markets_NNS pales_VBZ in_IN comparison_NN to_TO the_DT 1930s_CD ,_, decades_NNS before_IN derivative_JJ instruments_NNS such_JJ as_IN options_NNS and_CC futures_NNS were_VBD introduced_VBN ._.
``_`` I_PRP just_RB ca_MD n't_RB believe_VB that_IN the_DT innovations_NNS in_IN the_DT financial_JJ market_NN are_VBP causing_VBG any_DT of_IN this_DT volatility_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP says_VBZ ._.
And_CC Robert_NNP D._NNP Arnott_NNP ,_, president_NN of_IN asset_NN allocator_NN First_NNP Quadrant_NNP ,_, notes_VBZ that_IN before_IN Friday_NNP 's_POS tailspin_NN ,_, daily_JJ volatility_NN on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP in_IN recent_JJ weeks_NNS had_VBD reached_VBN ``_`` historically_RB low_JJ levels_NNS ._. ''_''
Some_DT people_NNS tend_VBP to_TO ignore_VB that_IN a_DT 50-point_JJ move_NN is_VBZ less_JJR in_IN percentage_NN terms_NNS than_IN it_PRP was_VBD when_WRB the_DT stock_NN market_NN was_VBD lower_JJR ._.
John_NNP J._NNP Phelan_NNP Jr._NNP ,_, chairman_NN of_IN the_DT Big_NNP Board_NNP ,_, asserts_VBZ that_IN ``_`` 1988_CD and_CC 1989_CD have_VBP been_VBN two_CD of_IN the_DT least_JJS volatile_JJ years_NNS in_IN the_DT last_JJ 30_CD or_CC 40_CD years_NNS ._. ''_''
But_CC the_DT low_JJ average_JJ volatility_NN Mr._NNP Phelan_NNP is_VBZ talking_VBG about_IN is_VBZ n't_RB any_DT comfort_NN in_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN rapid_JJ stock-market_NN moves_NNS like_IN the_DT past_JJ week_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, Sanford_NNP Grossman_NNP ,_, a_DT Wharton_NNP School_NNP finance_NN professor_NN ,_, says_VBZ volatile_JJ jumps_NNS in_IN stock_NN prices_NNS will_MD continue_VB as_RB long_RB as_IN liquidity_NN falls_VBZ short_NN of_IN the_DT voracious_JJ demands_NNS of_IN institutions_NNS ``_`` who_WP can_MD go_VB out_IN and_CC say_VBP `_`` I_PRP have_VBP a_DT billion_CD dollars_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS to_TO sell_VB ._. '_'' ''_''
Some_DT people_NNS think_VBP the_DT search_NN for_IN liquidity_NN is_VBZ fruitless_JJ ._.
In_IN 1936_CD ,_, John_NNP Maynard_NNP Keynes_NNP wrote_VBD that_IN ``_`` of_IN the_DT maxims_NNS of_IN orthodox_JJ finance_NN none_NN ,_, surely_RB ,_, is_VBZ more_RBR antisocial_JJ than_IN the_DT fetish_NN of_IN liquidity_NN ._. ''_''
It_PRP leads_VBZ investors_NNS to_TO focus_VB on_IN short-term_JJ price_NN movements_NNS --_: ``_`` a_DT game_NN of_IN musical_JJ chairs_NNS ,_, ''_'' he_PRP called_VBD it_PRP --_: rather_RB than_IN on_IN long-term_JJ fundamental_JJ valuation_NN ._.
James_NNP A._NNP White_NNP contributed_VBD to_TO this_DT article_NN ._.
The_DT National_NNP Aeronautics_NNP and_CC Space_NNP Administration_NNP said_VBD a_DT computer_NN virus_NN has_VBZ infected_VBN one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ networks_NNS and_CC is_VBZ spreading_VBG anti-nuclear_JJ messages_NNS related_VBN to_TO its_PRP$ Galileo_NNP space_NN probe_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ to_TO be_VB launched_VBN today_NN ._.

Although_IN the_DT network_NN is_VBZ n't_RB connected_VBN to_TO the_DT computer_NN systems_NNS that_WDT operate_VBP either_DT Galileo_NNP or_CC the_DT shuttle_NN ,_, part_NN of_IN the_DT network_NN will_MD carry_VB analyses_NNS of_IN Galileo_NNP data_NNS once_RB the_DT craft_NN gets_VBZ spaceborn_JJ ._.

He_PRP estimated_VBD it_PRP could_MD take_VB a_DT day_NN for_IN a_DT computer_NN security_NN manager_NN to_TO expunge_VB the_DT virus_NN from_IN a_DT computer_NN system_NN ._.
The_DT intruder_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT broadest_JJS yet_RB to_TO hit_VB a_DT research_NN network_NN ,_, appeared_VBD to_TO affect_VB only_RB Digital_NNP Equipment_NNP Corp._NNP hardware_NN that_WDT uses_VBZ Digital_NNP 's_POS VAX\/VMS_NNP operating_VBG system_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unrelated_JJ to_TO the_DT much-publicized_JJ virus_NN that_IN last_JJ year_NN infected_VBN Arpanet_NNP ,_, a_DT much_RB larger_JJR network_NN used_VBN by_IN researchers_NNS at_IN universities_NNS ,_, laboratories_NNS and_CC government_NN agencies_NNS around_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT lingo_NN of_IN computer_NN security_NN ,_, the_DT NASA_NNP intruder_NN is_VBZ technically_RB a_DT computer_NN worm_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Redmond_NNP said_VBD ._.
A_DT worm_NN resides_VBZ in_IN the_DT operating_VBG system_NN of_IN a_DT computer_NN and_CC spreads_VBZ by_IN boring_JJ into_IN other_JJ computers_NNS contacted_VBN through_IN networks_NNS ._.
The_DT Galileo_NNP worm_NN apparently_RB was_VBD hatched_VBN on_IN a_DT computer_NN in_IN France_NNP hooked_VBD up_IN to_TO NASA_NNP 's_POS Space_NNP Physics_NNP Analysis_NNP Network_NNP ,_, Mr._NNP Redmond_NNP said_VBD ._.
NASA_NNP said_VBD the_DT Galileo_NNP worm_NN had_VBD n't_RB affected_VBN its_PRP$ computers_NNS or_CC the_DT computers_NNS of_IN other_JJ government_NN agencies_NNS because_IN they_PRP had_VBD modified_VBN their_PRP$ systems_NNS to_TO reject_VB worms_NNS ._.
But_CC Mr._NNP Redmond_NNP said_VBD the_DT worm_NN hit_VBD universities_NNS that_WDT had_VBD n't_RB elected_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT changes_NNS ._.
Michael_NNP Alexander_NNP ,_, a_DT senior_JJ editor_NN at_IN Computerworld_NNP ,_, a_DT trade_NN publication_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP was_VBD told_VBN that_IN the_DT worm_NN gets_VBZ into_IN a_DT computer_NN center_NN by_IN looking_VBG for_IN obvious_JJ passwords_NNS --_: such_JJ as_IN ones_NNS that_WDT are_VBP the_DT same_JJ as_IN the_DT user_NN 's_POS name_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP finds_VBZ one_CD and_CC gets_VBZ into_IN the_DT system_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD display_VB a_DT screen_NN when_WRB a_DT user_NN logs_NNS on_IN that_DT says_VBZ ,_, ``_`` Worms_NNPS Against_IN Nuclear_NNP Killers_NNPS ..._: ._.
You_PRP talk_VBP of_IN times_NNS of_IN peace_NN for_IN all_DT ,_, and_CC then_RB prepare_VB for_IN war_NN ._. ''_''
In_IN addition_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Alexander_NNP said_VBD ,_, the_DT worm_NN sends_VBZ strange_JJ messages_NNS to_TO other_JJ machines_NNS at_IN the_DT center_NN --_: such_JJ as_IN ,_, ``_`` George_NNP Orwell_NNP was_VBD an_DT optimist_NN ,_, ''_'' or_CC ``_`` Do_VBP n't_RB feed_VB the_DT bats_NNS tonight_RB ._. ''_''
The_DT worm_NN also_RB looks_VBZ for_IN elementary_JJ passwords_NNS that_WDT confer_VBP more_JJR privileges_NNS on_IN the_DT user_NN ._.
The_DT passwords_NNS are_VBP included_VBN in_IN the_DT system_NN software_NN when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ installed_VBN but_CC are_VBP supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB replaced_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT system_NN is_VBZ up_IN and_CC running_VBG ._.
If_IN it_PRP finds_VBZ one_CD of_IN those_DT passwords_NNS ,_, Mr._NNP Alexander_NNP said_VBD ,_, the_DT worm_NN will_MD do_VB such_JJ things_NNS as_IN change_NN users_NNS '_POS passwords_NNS to_TO a_DT series_NN of_IN random_JJ numbers_NNS ,_, preventing_VBG them_PRP from_IN signing_VBG on_IN to_TO the_DT network_NN ._.
NASA_NNP estimated_VBD that_IN ,_, on_IN Monday_NNP ,_, about_IN four_CD computer_NN centers_NNS were_VBD affected_VBN ._.
Yesterday_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN grew_VBD to_TO 40_CD ;_: today_NN the_DT number_NN is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO grow_VB to_TO 100_CD ._.
NASA_NNP said_VBD it_PRP will_MD take_VB about_IN a_DT week_NN before_IN it_PRP knows_VBZ exactly_RB how_WRB many_JJ centers_NNS of_IN the_DT 6,000_CD connected_VBN to_TO Internet_NNP were_VBD affected_VBN and_CC the_DT extent_NN of_IN the_DT damage_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT ._.
Anti-nuclear_JJ activists_NNS have_VBP protested_VBN the_DT launch_NN of_IN the_DT Galileo_NNP space_NN probe_NN to_TO Jupiter_NNP because_IN it_PRP uses_VBZ plutonium_NN to_TO generate_VB the_DT electricity_NN needed_VBN to_TO run_VB the_DT craft_NN ._.
Activists_NNS fear_VBP that_IN if_IN the_DT shuttle_NN carrying_VBG Galileo_NNP into_IN orbit_NN should_MD explode_VB ,_, or_CC if_IN Galileo_NNP itself_PRP crashes_VBZ into_IN the_DT Earth_NNP during_IN the_DT two_CD times_NNS it_PRP flies_VBZ close_RB to_TO the_DT planet_NN ,_, fatal_JJ levels_NNS of_IN plutonium_NN would_MD be_VB released_VBN into_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._.
So_RB far_RB Galileo_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN delayed_VBN twice_RB ,_, once_RB because_IN of_IN a_DT computer_NN malfunction_NN connected_VBN with_IN a_DT space-shuttle_NN engine_NN ,_, and_CC yesterday_NN because_IN of_IN the_DT weather_NN ._.
NASA_NNP said_VBD the_DT Galileo_NNP worm_NN had_VBD nothing_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN either_DT delay_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Alexander_NNP of_IN Computerworld_NNP said_VBD hackers_NNS have_VBP gone_VBN after_IN SPAN_NNP before_RB ._.
He_PRP said_VBD the_DT Chaos_NNP Computer_NNP Club_NNP ,_, of_IN West_NNP Germany_NNP ,_, once_RB managed_VBD to_TO invade_VB SPAN_NNP and_CC do_VBP such_JJ things_NNS as_IN change_NN the_DT value_NN of_IN pi_NN ,_, messing_VBG up_IN some_DT calculations_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ now_RB a_DT commonplace_NN that_IN prosecutors_NNS are_VBP bringing_VBG criminal_JJ indictments_NNS in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB until_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ago_RB only_RB a_DT civil_JJ action_NN at_IN most_RBS would_MD have_VB been_VBN brought_VBN ._.
Yet_RB it_PRP is_VBZ also_RB axiomatic_JJ that_IN the_DT power_NN to_TO create_VB new_JJ crimes_NNS belongs_VBZ only_RB to_TO the_DT legislature_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB to_TO courts_NNS ._.
Beginning_VBG in_IN the_DT early_JJ 19th_JJ century_NN ,_, with_IN U.S._NNP v._CC Hudson_NNP and_CC Goodwin_NNP ,_, the_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP has_VBZ repeatedly_RB held_VBN that_IN a_DT judicial_JJ power_NN to_TO declare_VB conduct_NN to_TO be_VB against_IN the_DT public_JJ interest_NN and_CC hence_RB criminal_JJ ,_, while_IN well_RB established_VBN in_IN British_JJ law_NN ,_, would_MD usurp_VB legislative_JJ authority_NN under_IN the_DT doctrine_NN of_IN separation_NN of_IN powers_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ the_DT conventional_JJ theory_NN anyway_RB ._.
In_IN practice_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT line_NN between_IN interpretation_NN and_CC redefinition_NN of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ law_NN long_JJ ago_RB began_VBD to_TO blur_VB ._.
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, a_DT common_JJ law_NN of_IN white-collar_JJ crime_NN has_VBZ developed_VBN with_IN surprising_JJ rapidity_NN over_IN the_DT past_JJ decade_NN ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, although_IN insider_NN trading_NN has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN criminal_JJ ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ never_RB been_VBN statutorily_RB defined_VBN ._.
In_IN 1983_CD ,_, the_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP tried_VBD to_TO supply_VB a_DT workable_JJ definition_NN in_IN the_DT Dirks_NNP v._CC SEC_NNP decision_NN ,_, which_WDT found_VBD that_DT liability_NN depended_VBD on_IN whether_IN the_DT tipper_NN had_VBD breached_VBN his_PRP$ fiduciary_JJ duty_NN to_TO the_DT corporation_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO obtain_VB ``_`` some_DT personal_JJ gain_NN ''_'' and_CC whether_IN the_DT tippee_NN knew_VBD or_CC recklessly_RB disregarded_VBD this_DT fact_NN ._.
Gradually_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, lower_JJR courts_NNS and_CC prosecutors_NNS have_VBP pushed_VBN this_DT definition_NN to_TO its_PRP$ breaking_NN point_NN ._.
Consider_VB the_DT facts_NNS underlying_VBG the_DT 1989_CD conviction_NN of_IN Robert_NNP Chestman_NNP ._.
Prior_RB to_TO a_DT tender_NN offer_NN by_IN A&P_NNP for_IN Waldbaum_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN 1986_CD ,_, the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT Waldbaum_NNP 's_POS supermarket_NN chain_NN called_VBD an_DT elderly_JJ relative_JJ to_TO tell_VB her_PRP$ to_TO assemble_VB her_PRP$ stock_NN certificates_NNS for_IN delivery_NN ._.
She_PRP called_VBD her_PRP$ daughter_NN to_TO take_VB her_PRP$ to_TO the_DT bank_NN ,_, who_WP ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, persuaded_VBD her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, a_DT Mr._NNP Loeb_NNP ,_, to_TO run_VB this_DT errand_NN ._.
Hearing_NNP of_IN this_DT information_NN ,_, the_DT husband_NN discussed_VBD it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ broker_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Chestman_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Chestman_NNP then_RB bought_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ account_NN and_CC other_JJ clients_NNS ._.
Basically_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Chestman_NNP was_VBD a_DT fourth-level_JJ tippee_NN ._.
Did_VBD Mr._NNP Loeb_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ tipper_NN ,_, breach_NN a_DT fiduciary_JJ duty_NN -LRB-_( and_CC ,_, if_IN so_RB ,_, to_TO whom_WP -RRB-_) ?_.
Did_VBD Mr._NNP Loeb_NNP seek_VB personal_JJ gain_NN -LRB-_( and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, how_WRB -RRB-_) ?_.
Or_CC did_VBD Mr._NNP Chestman_NNP only_RB hear_VB a_DT market_NN rumor_NN -LRB-_( which_WDT one_PRP may_MD lawfully_RB trade_VB upon_IN -RRB-_) ?_.
The_DT line_NN seems_VBZ awfully_RB thin_JJ for_IN criminal-law_NN purposes_NNS ._.
A_DT second_JJ illustration_NN is_VBZ supplied_VBN by_IN the_DT recent_JJ guilty_JJ plea_NN entered_VBN by_IN Robert_NNP Freeman_NNP ,_, formerly_RB head_VBP of_IN arbitrage_NN at_IN Goldman_NNP ,_, Sachs_NNP &_CC Co_NNP ._.
Essentially_RB ,_, Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP had_VBD invested_VBN heavily_RB in_IN the_DT Beatrice_NNP leveraged_JJ buy-out_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD told_VBN by_IN another_DT prominent_JJ trader_NN ,_, Bernard_NNP ``_`` Bunny_NNP ''_'' Lasker_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT deal_NN was_VBD in_IN trouble_NN ._.
After_IN placing_VBG orders_NNS to_TO sell_VB ,_, Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP called_VBD Martin_NNP Siegel_NNP ,_, an_DT investment_NN banker_NN at_IN Kidder_NNP ,_, Peabody_NNP &_CC Co._NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD advising_VBG on_IN the_DT deal_NN ,_, to_TO confirm_VB these_DT rumors_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Siegel_NNP asked_VBD Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP who_WP his_PRP$ source_NN was_VBD and_CC ,_, on_IN hearing_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD Bunny_NNP Lasker_NNP ,_, responded_VBD :_: ``_`` Well_UH ,_, your_PRP$ bunny_NN has_VBZ a_DT good_JJ nose_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT illegal_JJ ``_`` tip_NN ''_'' of_IN the_DT bunny_NN 's_POS good_JJ nose_NN was_VBD then_RB largely_RB a_DT confirmation_NN of_IN rumors_NNS already_RB known_VBN to_TO many_VB in_IN the_DT market_NN ._.
Had_VBD the_DT case_NN gone_VBN to_TO trial_VB the_DT same_JJ issues_NNS would_MD have_VB surfaced_VBN :_:
Was_VBD there_EX a_DT fiduciary_JJ breach_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO obtain_VB personal_JJ gain_NN ?_.
Did_VBD Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP have_VBP notice_NN of_IN this_DT ?_.
Finally_RB ,_, was_VBD the_DT information_NN material_NN ?_.
Yet_RB ,_, all_PDT these_DT issues_NNS are_VBP subsidiary_NN to_TO a_DT more_RBR central_JJ issue_NN :_: Who_WP is_VBZ and_CC who_WP should_MD be_VB making_VBG the_DT criminal_JJ law_NN here_RB ?_.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB my_PRP$ contention_NN that_IN either_DT Mr._NNP Chestman_NNP or_CC Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP was_VBD an_DT innocent_JJ victim_NN of_IN prosecutorial_JJ overzealousness_NN ._.
Arguably_RB ,_, both_DT were_VBD on_IN notice_NN that_IN their_PRP$ behavior_NN was_VBD at_IN least_JJS risky_JJ ._.
But_CC even_RB if_IN they_PRP behaved_VBD recklessly_RB ,_, reasons_NNS still_RB exist_VBP to_TO fear_VB and_CC resist_VB this_DT steady_JJ process_NN of_IN case-by-case_JJ judicial_JJ extension_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN of_IN insider_NN trading_NN ._.
Courts_NNS and_CC legislatures_NNS make_VBP decisions_NNS in_IN very_RB different_JJ ways_NNS and_CC are_VBP each_DT susceptible_JJ to_TO very_RB different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN errors_NNS ._.
After-the-fact_JJ judicial_JJ examination_NN of_IN an_DT actor_NN 's_POS conduct_NN has_VBZ always_RB been_VBN the_DT common_JJ law_NN 's_POS method_NN ._.
When_WRB only_RB civil_JJ liability_NN is_VBZ involved_VBN ,_, this_DT method_NN has_VBZ the_DT undeniable_JJ strengths_NNS of_IN factual_JJ specificity_NN and_CC avoidance_NN of_IN overgeneralization_NN ._.
Still_RB ,_, case-by-case_JJ retrospective_NN decision_NN making_VBG of_IN this_DT sort_NN is_VBZ vulnerable_JJ to_TO the_DT tunnel_NN vision_NN caused_VBN by_IN a_DT fixation_NN on_IN ad_NN hoc_FW -LRB-_( and_CC usually_RB sleazy_JJ -RRB-_) examples_NNS ._.
When_WRB a_DT court_NN decides_VBZ that_IN a_DT particular_JJ actor_NN 's_POS conduct_NN was_VBD culpable_JJ and_CC so_RB extends_VBZ the_DT definition_NN of_IN insider_NN trading_NN to_TO reach_VB this_DT conduct_NN ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB see_VB the_DT potentially_RB enormous_JJ number_NN of_IN other_JJ cases_NNS that_WDT will_MD be_VB covered_VBN by_IN the_DT expanded_VBN rule_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, a_DT court_NN is_VBZ poorly_RB positioned_VBN to_TO make_VB judgments_NNS about_IN the_DT social_JJ utility_NN of_IN the_DT expanded_VBN rule_NN ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, in_IN focusing_VBG on_IN Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP 's_POS attempt_NN to_TO gain_VB nonpublic_JJ information_NN about_IN a_DT deal_NN 's_POS collapse_NN ,_, one_CD does_VBZ not_RB naturally_RB think_VB about_IN the_DT reverse_NN side_NN of_IN the_DT coin_NN :_: What_WP if_IN the_DT rumor_NN had_VBD been_VBN false_JJ ?_.
Can_MD a_DT security_NN analyst_NN call_NN an_DT investment_NN banker_NN to_TO make_VB certain_JJ that_IN a_DT seemingly_RB improbable_JJ rumor_NN is_VBZ in_IN fact_NN false_JJ ?_.
In_IN the_DT past_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB would_MD reputable_JJ professionals_NNS have_VB rushed_VBN to_TO check_VB out_RP such_JJ rumors_NNS with_IN the_DT company_NN ,_, but_CC companies_NNS listed_VBN on_IN the_DT major_JJ stock_NN exchanges_NNS were_VBD encouraged_VBN by_IN the_DT exchanges_NNS to_TO respond_VB openly_RB to_TO such_JJ inquiries_NNS from_IN securities_NNS analysts_NNS ._.
Today_NN ,_, after_IN Mr._NNP Freeman_NNP 's_POS plea_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ an_DT uncertainty_NN that_WDT is_VBZ both_DT unfair_JJ and_CC inefficient_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT light_NN ,_, the_DT comparative_JJ advantages_NNS of_IN legislative_JJ law-making_NNS become_VBP clear_JJ :_: -LRB-_( 1_CD -RRB-_) Before_IN it_PRP acts_VBZ ,_, the_DT legislature_NN typically_RB will_MD hear_VB the_DT views_NNS of_IN representatives_NNS of_IN all_PDT those_DT affected_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ decision_NN ,_, not_RB just_RB the_DT immediate_JJ parties_NNS before_IN the_DT court_NN ;_: and_CC -LRB-_( 2_CD -RRB-_) the_DT legislature_NN can_MD frame_VB ``_`` bright_JJ line_NN ''_'' standards_NNS that_WDT create_VBP less_JJR uncertainty_NN than_IN the_DT fact-bound_JJ decisions_NNS of_IN courts_NNS ._.
Although_IN legislative_JJ lines_NNS can_MD result_VB in_IN under-inclusion_NN -LRB-_( which_WDT explains_VBZ why_WRB the_DT SEC_NNP has_VBZ long_RB resisted_VBN a_DT legislative_JJ definition_NN of_IN insider_NN trading_NN -RRB-_) ,_, judicial_JJ lawmaking_JJ inevitably_RB creates_VBZ uncertainty_NN because_IN of_IN the_DT shadowy_JJ outer_JJ edges_NNS and_CC implications_NNS of_IN most_RBS judicial_JJ decisions_NNS ._.
At_IN least_JJS when_WRB the_DT stakes_NNS are_VBP high_JJ ,_, uncertainty_NN in_IN turn_NN results_NNS in_IN overinclusion_NN ,_, as_IN individuals_NNS do_VBP not_RB dare_VB to_TO approach_VB an_DT uncertain_JJ line_NN closely_RB ._.
The_DT federal_JJ mail_NN and_CC wire_NN fraud_NN statutes_NNS provide_VBP even_RB better_JJR illustrations_NNS of_IN the_DT rapid_JJ evolution_NN of_IN a_DT federal_JJ common_JJ law_NN of_IN white-collar_JJ crime_NN ._.
In_IN 1987_CD ,_, the_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP attempted_VBD in_IN McNally_NNP v._CC U.S._NNP to_TO halt_VB the_DT inexorable_JJ expansion_NN of_IN these_DT statutes_NNS by_IN adopting_VBG a_DT rule_NN of_IN strict_JJ construction_NN for_IN ambiguous_JJ criminal_JJ statues_NNS ._.
Yet_RB ,_, late_JJ last_JJ year_NN ,_, Congress_NNP effectively_RB reversed_VBD this_DT decision_NN by_IN enacting_VBG a_DT one-sentence_JJ statute_NN that_WDT defined_VBD fraud_NN to_TO include_VB any_DT scheme_NN to_TO deprive_VB another_DT of_IN ``_`` the_DT intangible_JJ right_NN of_IN honest_JJ services_NNS ._. ''_''
At_IN a_DT stroke_NN ,_, this_DT may_MD criminalize_VB all_DT fiduciary_JJ breaches_NNS -LRB-_( and_CC possibly_RB all_DT misrepresentations_NNS by_IN an_DT agent_NN or_CC employee_NN -RRB-_) ._.
Such_JJ a_DT statute_NN illustrates_VBZ the_DT fundamental_JJ problem_NN :_: Congress_NNP finds_VBZ it_PRP is_VBZ easier_JJR to_TO pass_VB sweepingly_RB moralistic_JJ prohibitions_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT courts_NNS must_MD thereafter_RB interpret_VB ,_, than_IN to_TO engage_VB in_IN the_DT difficult_JJ line-drawing_JJ distinctions_NNS that_WDT are_VBP inherently_RB its_PRP$ responsibility_NN ._.
We_PRP are_VBP confronted_VBN less_JJR with_IN a_DT judicial_JJ power_NN grab_NN than_IN with_IN a_DT legislative_JJ giveaway_NN ._.
Predictably_RB ,_, when_WRB confronted_VBN with_IN morally_RB dubious_JJ behavior_NN ,_, prosecutors_NNS will_MD exploit_VB the_DT latitude_NN such_JJ openended_VBN statutes_NNS give_VBP them_PRP ._.

``_`` What_WP happened_VBD in_IN the_DT stock_NN market_NN and_CC the_DT bigger_JJR trade_NN deficit_NN ''_'' reported_VBD yesterday_NN ``_`` make_VB it_PRP unlikely_JJ that_IN short-term_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS will_MD rise_VB ''_'' any_DT time_NN soon_RB ,_, said_VBD Mr._NNP Mehl_NNP of_IN Banxquote_NNP ._.

The_DT IMF_NNP has_VBZ several_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN requesting_VBG the_DT increase_NN ._.
